kubara:1:1: Kubarwa kw’Abisirayeli1.Uwiteka abwirira Mose mu butayu bwa Sinayi ari mu ihema ry’ibonaniro, ku munsi wa mbere w’ukwezi kwa kabiri k’umwaka wa kabiri bavuye mu gihugu cya Egiputa, ati
kubara:1:2: 2.“Mubare umubare w’iteraniro ry’Abisirayeli ryose nk’uko imiryango yabo iri, nk’uko amazu ya ba sekuru ari, mubare amazina y’abagabo bose umwe umwe.
kubara:1:3: 3.Abamaze imyaka makumyabiri cyangwa isāga bavutse, abo mu Bisirayeli bose babasha gutabara, wowe na Aroni mubabare uko imitwe yabo iri.
kubara:1:4: 4.Mufatanye n’umuntu wo mu muryango wose w’umutware w’inzu ya ba sekuru.
kubara:1:5: 5.“Aya ni yo mazina y’abantu bakwiriye guhagararana namwe: mu Barubeni ni Elisuri mwene Shedewuri;
kubara:1:6: 6.mu Basimeyoni ni Shelumiyeli mwene Surishadayi;
kubara:1:7: 7.mu Bayuda ni Nahashoni mwene Aminadabu;
kubara:1:8: 8.mu Bisakari ni Netanēli mwene Suwari;
kubara:1:9: 9.mu Bazebuluni ni Eliyabu mwene Heloni;
kubara:1:10: 10.mu Bayosefu ni Elishama mwene Amihudi wo mu Befurayimu, na Gamaliyeli mwene Pedasuri wo mu Bamanase;
kubara:1:11: 11.mu Babenyamini ni Abidani mwene Gideyoni;
kubara:1:12: 12.mu Badani ni Ahiyezeri mwene Amishadayi;
kubara:1:13: 13.mu Bashēri ni Pagiyeli mwene Okirani;
kubara:1:14: 14.mu Bagadi ni Eliyasafu mwene Deweli;
kubara:1:15: 15.mu Banafutali ni Ahira mwene Enani.”
kubara:1:16: 16.Abo ni bo bajya bahamagarwa mu iteraniro, ni bo batware b’imiryango ya ba sekuruza, ni bo bategeka b’ibihumbi by’Abisirayeli.
kubara:1:17: 17.Mose na Aroni bajyana abo bantu bavuzwe amazina,
kubara:1:18: 18.bateranya iteraniro ryose ku munsi wa mbere w’ukwezi kwa kabiri. Amavuko y’abantu yandikwa nk’uko imiryango yabo iri, nk’uko amazu ya ba sekuru ari, babara amazina yabo umwe umwe y’abamaze imyaka makumyabiri n’isāga.
kubara:1:19: 19.Uko Uwiteka yategetse Mose, aba ari ko ababarira mu butayu bwa Sinayi.
kubara:1:20: 20.Bandika amavuko y’Abarubeni imfura ya Isirayeli nk’uko imiryango yabo iri, nk’uko amazu ya ba sekuru ari, babara amazina y’abagabo bose umwe umwe, bamaze imyaka makumyabiri bavutse cyangwa isāga, ababasha gutabara bose.
kubara:1:21: 21.Ababazwe bo mu muryango wa Rubeni baba inzovu enye n’ibihumbi bitandatu na magana atanu.
kubara:1:22: 22.Bandika amavuko y’Abasimeyoni nk’uko imiryango yabo iri, nk’uko amazu ya ba sekuru ari, babara amazina y’abagabo bose umwe umwe, bamaze imyaka makumyabiri bavutse cyangwa isāga, ababasha gutabara bose.
kubara:1:23: 23.Ababazwe bo mu muryango wa Simiyoni baba inzovu eshanu n’ibihumbi cyenda na magana atatu.
kubara:1:24: 24.Bandika amavuko y’Abagadi nk’uko imiryango yabo iri, nk’uko amazu ya ba sekuru ari, babara amazina y’abagabo bose umwe umwe, bamaze imyaka makumyabiri bavutse cyangwa isāga, ababasha gutabara bose.
kubara:1:25: 25.Ababazwe bo mu muryango wa Gadi baba inzovu enye n’ibihumbi bitanu na magana atandatu na mirongo itanu.

kubara:1:27: 27.Ababazwe bo mu muryango wa Yuda baba inzovu ndwi n’ibihumbi bine na magana atandatu.
kubara:1:28: 28.Bandika amavuko y’Abisakari nk’uko imiryango yabo iri, nk’uko amazu ya ba sekuru ari, babara amazina y’abagabo bose umwe umwe, bamaze imyaka makumyabiri bavutse cyangwa isāga, ababasha gutabara bose.
kubara:1:29: 29.Ababazwe bo mu muryango wa Isakari baba inzovu eshanu n’ibihumbi bine na magana ane.
kubara:1:30: 30.Bandika amavuko y’Abazebuluni nk’uko imiryango yabo iri, nk’uko amazu ya ba sekuru ari, babara amazina y’abagabo bose umwe umwe, bamaze imyaka makumyabiri bavutse cyangwa isāga, ababasha gutabara bose.
kubara:1:31: 31.Ababazwe bo mu muryango wa Zebuluni baba inzovu eshanu n’ibihumbi birindwi na magana ane.
kubara:1:32: 32.Mu Bayosefu bandika amavuko y’Abefurayimu nk’uko imiryango yabo iri, nk’uko amazu ya ba sekuru ari, babara amazina y’abagabo bose umwe umwe, bamaze imyaka makumyabiri bavutse cyangwa isāga, ababasha gutabara bose.

kubara:1:34: 34.Bandika amavuko y’Abamanase nk’uko imiryango yabo iri, nk’uko amazu ya ba sekuru ari, babara amazina y’abagabo bose umwe umwe, bamaze imyaka makumyabiri bavutse cyangwa isāga, ababasha gutabara bose.
kubara:1:35: 35.Ababazwe bo mu muryango wa Manase baba inzovu eshatu n’ibihumbi bibiri na magana abiri.
kubara:1:36: 36.Bandika amavuko y’Ababenyamini nk’uko imiryango yabo iri, nk’uko amazu ya ba sekuru ari, babara amazina y’abagabo bose umwe umwe, bamaze imyaka makumyabiri bavutse cyangwa isāga, ababasha gutabara bose.
kubara:1:37: 37.Ababazwe bo mu muryango wa Benyamini baba inzovu eshatu n’ibihumbi bitanu na magana ane.
kubara:1:38: 38.Bandika amavuko y’Abadani nk’uko imiryango yabo iri, nk’uko amazu ya ba sekuru ari, babara amazina y’abagabo bose umwe umwe, bamaze imyaka makumyabiri bavutse cyangwa isāga, ababasha gutabara bose.
kubara:1:39: 39.Ababazwe bo mu muryango wa Dani baba inzovu esheshatu n’ibihumbi bibiri na magana arindwi.
kubara:1:40: 40.Bandika amavuko y’Abashēri nk’uko imiryango yabo iri, nk’uko amazu ya ba sekuru ari, babara amazina y’abagabo bose umwe umwe, bamaze imyaka makumyabiri bavutse cyangwa isāga, ababasha gutabara bose.
kubara:1:41: 41.Ababazwe bo mu muryango wa Asheri baba inzovu enye n’igihumbi na magana atanu.
kubara:1:42: 42.Bandika amavuko y’Abanafutali nk’uko imiryango yabo iri, nk’uko amazu ya ba sekuru ari, babara amazina y’abagabo bose umwe umwe, bamaze imyaka makumyabiri bavutse cyangwa isāga, ababasha gutabara bose.
kubara:1:43: 43.Ababazwe bo mu muryango wa Nafutali baba inzovu eshanu n’ibihumbi bitatu na magana ane.
kubara:1:44: 44.Abo ni bo babazwe na Mose na Aroni na ba batware b’Abisirayeli uko ari cumi na babiri, umuntu umwe wo mu nzu ya ba sekuru yose.
kubara:1:45: 45.Nuko ababazwe bose bo mu Bisirayeli nk’uko amazu ya ba sekuru ari, bamaze imyaka makumyabiri bavutse cyangwa isāga, abo mu Bisirayeli babasha gutabara bose;
kubara:1:46: 46.ababazwe bose baba uduhumbi dutandatu n’ibihumbi bitatu na magana atanu na mirongo itanu.
kubara:1:47: Abalewi ntibabarwa; Uwiteka ategeka imirimo yabo47.Abalewi nk’uko umuryango wa ba sekuru uri, ntibarakabaranwa na bo,
kubara:1:48: 48.kuko Uwiteka yabwiye Mose ati
kubara:1:49: 49.“Ariko uwo muryango wa Lewi wo ntuzawubare, ntubarane umubare wabo n’Abisirayeli bandi.
kubara:1:50: 50.Ahubwo Abalewi ubagire abarinzi b’ubuturo bw’Ibihamya, n’ab’ibintu byo muri bwo byose, n’ab’ibyabwo byose. Bajye baremērwa ubwo buturo n’ibintu byo muri bwo bwose, abe ari bo bajya bakoreramo imirimo, bajye babugotesha amahema yabo.
kubara:1:51: 51.Kandi uko ubwo buturo buhagurutse, Abalewi abe ari bo bajya babushingura, kandi uko bugiye kubambwa, Abalewi abe ari bo babushinga. Utari uwo muri bo wigizwa hafi no kubyishyiramo yicwe.
kubara:1:52: 52.Abisirayeli bajye babamba amahema yabo, umuntu wese mu cyiciro cy’amahema y’ababo, umuntu wese ahererane n’ibendera ry’ababo nk’uko imitwe yabo iri.
kubara:1:53: 53.Ariko Abalewi bakikize amahema yabo ubuturo bw’Ibihamya, kugira ngo umujinya utaba ku iteraniro ry’Abisirayeli. Abalewi bitondere umurimo wo kurinda ubuturo bw’Ibihamya.”
kubara:1:54: 54.Uko abe ari ko Abisirayeli bakora, uko Uwiteka yategetse Mose kose abe ari ko bakora.
kubara:2:1: Itegeko ryo kubamba amahema mu byiciro bine1.Uwiteka abwira Mose na Aroni ati
kubara:2:2: 2.“Abisirayeli bajye babamba amahema yabo, umuntu wese ahererane n’ibendera ry’ababo, kandi babe munsi y’utubendera tw’amazu ya ba sekuru, berekeze amahema yabo ihema ry’ibonaniro bayarigoteshe.
kubara:2:3: 3.“Abayabamba iburasirazuba bajye baba ab’icyiciro cya Yuda, kirimo ibendera ryacyo n’imitwe yacyo, umutware w’Abayuda abe Nahashoni mwene Aminadabu.
kubara:2:4: 4.Umutwe we warimo abagabo inzovu ndwi n’ibihumbi bine na magana atandatu nk’uko babazwe.
kubara:2:5: 5.Ab’umuryango wa Isakari abe ari bo bahererana na bo, umutware w’Abisakari abe Netanēli mwene Suwari.
kubara:2:6: 6.Umutwe we warimo abagabo inzovu eshanu n’ibihumbi bine na magana ane nk’uko babazwe.
kubara:2:7: 7.Bahererwe n’ab’umuryango wa Zebuluni, umutware w’Abazebuluni abe Eliyabu mwene Heloni.
kubara:2:8: 8.Umutwe we warimo abagabo inzovu eshanu n’ibihumbi birindwi na magana ane nk’uko babazwe.
kubara:2:9: 9.Ababazwe bo mu cyiciro cya Yuda bose bari abagabo agahumbi n’inzovu munani n’ibihumbi bitandatu na magana ane nk’uko imitwe yabo yari iri. Abo abe ari bo bajya babanza guhaguruka.
kubara:2:10: 10.“Mu ruhande rw’ikusi hajye haba icyiciro cya Rubeni kirimo ibendera ryacyo n’imitwe yacyo, umutware w’Abarubeni abe Elisuri mwene Shedewuri.
kubara:2:11: 11.Umutwe we warimo abagabo inzovu enye n’ibihumbi bitandatu na magana atanu nk’uko babazwe.
kubara:2:12: 12.Ab’umuryango wa Simiyoni abe ari bo bahererana na bo, umutware w’Abasimeyoni abe Shelumiyeli mwene Surishadayi.
kubara:2:13: 13.Umutwe we warimo abagabo inzovu eshanu n’ibihumbi cyenda na magana atatu nk’uko babazwe.
kubara:2:14: 14.Bahererwe n’ab’umuryango wa Gadi, umutware w’Abagadi abe Eliyasafu mwene Deweli.
kubara:2:15: 15.Umutwe we warimo abagabo inzovu enye n’ibihumbi bitanu na magana atandatu na mirongo itanu nk’uko babazwe.
kubara:2:16: 16.Ababazwe bo mu cyiciro cya Rubeni bose bari abagabo agahumbi n’inzovu eshanu n’igihumbi na magana ane na mirongo itanu nk’uko imitwe yabo yari iri. Abo abe ari bo bajya baba aba kabiri mu ihaguruka.
kubara:2:17: 17.“Maze ihema ry’ibonaniro rijye rihagurukana n’icyiciro cy’Abalewi kigenda hagati y’ibindi byiciro. Uko babambye amahema abe ari ko bahaguruka, umuntu wese muri gahunda ye, bahereranye n’amabendera y’ababo.
kubara:2:18: 18.“Mu ruhande rw’iburengerazuba hajye haba icyiciro cya Efurayimu, kirimo ibendera ryacyo n’imitwe yacyo, umutware w’Abefurayimu abe Elishama mwene Amihudi.
kubara:2:19: 19.Umutwe we warimo abagabo inzovu enye na magana atanu nk’uko babazwe.
kubara:2:20: 20.Ab’umuryango wa Manase abe ari bo bahererana na bo, umutware w’Abamanase abe Gamaliyeli mwene Pedasuri.
kubara:2:21: 21.Umutwe we warimo abagabo inzovu eshatu n’ibihumbi bibiri na magana abiri nk’uko babazwe.
kubara:2:22: 22.Bahererwe n’ab’umuryango wa Benyamini, umutware w’Ababenyamini abe Abidani mwene Gideyoni.
kubara:2:23: 23.Umutwe we warimo abagabo inzovu eshatu n’ibihumbi bitanu na magana ane nk’uko babazwe.
kubara:2:24: 24.Ababazwe bo mu cyiciro cya Efurayimu bose, bari abagabo agahumbi n’ibihumbi munani n’ijana nk’uko imitwe yabo yari iri. Abo abe ari bo bajya baba aba gatatu mu ihaguruka.
kubara:2:25: 25.“Mu ruhande rw’ikasikazi hajye haba icyiciro cya Dani, kirimo ibendera ryacyo n’imitwe yacyo, umutware w’Abadani abe Ahiyezeri mwene Amishadayi.
kubara:2:26: 26.Umutwe we warimo abagabo inzovu esheshatu n’ibihumbi bibiri na magana arindwi nk’uko babazwe.
kubara:2:27: 27.Ab’umuryango wa Asheri abe ari bo bahererana na bo, umutware w’Abashēri abe Pagiyeli mwene Okirani.
kubara:2:28: 28.Umutwe we warimo abagabo inzovu enye n’igihumbi na magana atanu nk’uko babazwe.
kubara:2:29: 29.Bahererwe n’ab’umuryango wa Nafutali, umutware w’Abanafutali abe Ahira mwene Enani.
kubara:2:30: 30.Umutwe we warimo abagabo inzovu eshanu n’ibihumbi bitatu na magana ane nk’uko babazwe.
kubara:2:31: 31.Ababazwe bo mu cyiciro cya Dani bose, bari abagabo agahumbi n’inzovu eshanu n’ibihumbi birindwi na magana atandatu. Abo abe ari bo basezera abandi bahereranye n’amabendera y’ababo.”
kubara:2:32: 32.Abo ni bo babazwe mu Bisirayeli nk’uko amazu ya ba sekuru ari. Ababazwe bo mu cyiciro bose nk’uko imitwe yabo yari iri, bari uduhumbi dutandatu n’ibihumbi bitatu na magana atanu na mirongo itanu.
kubara:2:33: 33.Ariko Abalewi ntibabaranwa n’Abisirayeli, uko Uwiteka yategetse Mose.
kubara:2:34: 34.Uko abe ari ko Abisirayeli bakora. Uko Uwiteka yategetse Mose kose, abe ari ko babamba amahema yabo bahereranye n’amabendera y’ababo, kandi uko abe ari ko bahaguruka, umuntu wese mu muryango we no mu nzu ya ba sekuru.
kubara:3:1: Kubarwa kw’Abalewi n’andi mategeko yabo1.Uru ni rwo rubyaro rwa Aroni na Mose, ubwo Uwiteka yabwiriraga Mose ku musozi wa Sinayi.
kubara:3:2: 2.Aya ni yo mazina ya bene Aroni: imfura ye ni Nadabu, abandi ni Abihu na Eleyazari na Itamari.
kubara:3:3: 3.Ayo ni yo mazina ya bene Aroni, abatambyi basīzwe bakerezwa gukorera Uwiteka umurimo w’ubutambyi.
kubara:3:4: 4.Nadabu na Abihu bapfiriye imbere y’Uwiteka, ubwo boserezaga umuriro udakwiriye imbere ye mu butayu bwa Sinayi, bapfa bucike. Eleyazari na Itamari bagakorera Uwiteka umurimo w’ubutambyi imbere ya Aroni se.
kubara:3:5: 5.Uwiteka abwira Mose ati
kubara:3:6: 6.“Igiza hafi ab’umuryango wa Lewi, ubashyire imbere ya Aroni umutambyi, kugira ngo bajye bamukorera.
kubara:3:7: 7.Barindire imbere y’ihema ry’ibonaniro iby’uwo yarindishijwe n’iby’iteraniro ryose ryarindishijwe, bajye bakora imirimo yo mu buturo bwera.
kubara:3:8: 8.Barinde ibintu byose byo mu ihema ry’ibonaniro n’iby’Abisirayeli barindishijwe, bajye bakora imirimo yo muri ubwo buturo.
kubara:3:9: 9.Nuko Abalewi uzabahe Aroni n’abana be, Aroni abahawe rwose mu cyimbo cy’Abisirayeli.
kubara:3:10: 10.Uzashyirireho Aroni n’abana be kwitondera imirimo y’ubutambyi bwabo, utari uwo muri bo wigirira hafi kubyishyiramo yicwe.”
kubara:3:11: 11.Uwiteka abwira Mose ati
kubara:3:12: 12.“Ubwanjye nikuriye Abalewi mu Bisirayeli mu cyimbo cy’abana b’imfura bose bo mu Bisirayeli. Abalewi bose bazaba abanjye.
kubara:3:13: 13.Kuko abana b’imfura bose ari abanjye, ku munsi nicaga abana b’imfura bo mu gihugu cya Egiputa bose, ni ho niyereje abana b’imfura bose bo mu Bisirayeli n’uburiza bw’amatungo. Bazaba abanjye, ndi Uwiteka.”
kubara:3:14: 14.Uwiteka abwirira Mose mu butayu bwa Sinayi ati
kubara:3:15: 15.“Bara Abalewi nk’uko amazu ya ba sekuru ari, nk’uko imiryango yabo iri, ubare abahungu n’abagabo bose, uhereye ku bana bamaze ukwezi bavutse.”
kubara:3:16: 16.Mose yumvira ijambo ry’Uwiteka, ababara uko yategetswe.
kubara:3:17: 17.Aba ni bo bana ba Lewi uko bitwa: Gerushoni na Kohati na Merari.
kubara:3:18: 18.Aya ni yo mazina ya bene Gerushoni nk’uko imiryango yabo iri: Libuni na Shimeyi.
kubara:3:19: 19.Aba ni bo bene Kohati nk’uko imiryango yabo iri: Amuramu na Isuhari, na Heburoni na Uziyeli.
kubara:3:20: 20.Aba ni bo bene Merari nk’uko imiryango yabo iri: Mahali na Mushi. Iyo ni yo miryango y’Abalewi nk’uko amazu ya ba sekuru ari.
kubara:3:21: 21.Gerushoni yakomotsweho n’umuryango w’Abalibuni n’uw’Abashimeyi. Iyo ni yo miryango y’Abagerushoni.
kubara:3:22: 22.Ababazwe bo muri bo, abahungu n’abagabo bose bahereye ku bamaze ukwezi bavutse, bari ibihumbi birindwi na magana atanu.
kubara:3:23: 23.Imiryango y’Abagerushoni ijye ibamba amahema yayo aho ubuturo bwera buteye ibitugu, mu ruhande rw’iburengerazuba.
kubara:3:24: 24.Umutware w’inzu ya ba sekuru y’Abagerushoni abe Eliyasafu mwene Layeli.
kubara:3:25: 25.Iby’ihema ry’ibonaniro Abagerushoni barindishwa, bibe ubuturo n’ihema n’ikirisakara, n’umwenda ukinga umuryango w’ihema ry’ibonaniro,
kubara:3:26: 26.n’imyenda ikinzwe y’urugo, n’umwenda ukinga irembo ry’urwo rugo rugota ubuturo n’igicaniro, n’imigozi yose ikoreshwa imirimo y’ubuturo.
kubara:3:27: 27.Kohati yakomotsweho n’umuryango w’Abamuramu n’uw’Abisuhari, n’uw’Abaheburoni n’uw’Abuziyeli. Iyo ni yo miryango y’Abakohati.
kubara:3:28: 28.Ababazwe bo muri bo, abahungu n’abagabo bose bahereye ku bamaze ukwezi bavutse, bari ibihumbi munani na magana atandatu, barindishijwe iby’Ahera.
kubara:3:29: 29.Imiryango y’Abakohati ijye ibamba amahema yayo mu ruhande rw’ubuturo rw’ikusi.
kubara:3:30: 30.Umutware w’inzu ya ba sekuru y’imiryango y’Abakohati abe Elisafani mwene Uziyeli.
kubara:3:31: 31.Ibyo barindishwa bibe isanduku yera n’ameza, n’igitereko cy’amatabaza n’ibicaniro, n’ibintu by’Ahera bakoresha, n’umwenda ukingiriza Ahera, n’ibifatanye na wo byose.
kubara:3:32: 32.Eleyazari mwene Aroni abe umutware utwara abatware b’Abalewi, ajye akoresha abarindishijwe iby’Ahera.
kubara:3:33: 33.Merari yakomotsweho n’umuryango w’Abamahali n’uw’Abamushi. Iyo ni yo miryango y’Abamerari.
kubara:3:34: 34.Ababazwe bo muri bo, abahungu n’abagabo bose bahereye ku bamaze ukwezi bavutse, bari ibihumbi bitandatu na magana abiri.
kubara:3:35: 35.Umutware w’inzu ya ba sekuru y’imiryango y’Abamerari ni Suriyeli mwene Abihayili. Bajye babamba amahema yabo mu ruhande rw’ikasikazi rw’ubuturo bwera.
kubara:3:36: 36.Umurimo Abamerari bategekwa ube uwo kurinda imbaho z’imiganda y’ubuturo, n’imbumbe zabwo n’inkingi zabwo, n’imyobo zishingwamo, n’ibintu byabwo byose, n’ibifatanye na byo byose,
kubara:3:37: 37.n’inkingi z’urugo rubugose n’imyobo zishingwamo, n’imambo zazo n’imigozi yazo.
kubara:3:38: 38.Mose na Aroni n’abana be, abe ari bo babamba amahema yabo imbere y’ubuturo mu ruhande rw’iburasirazuba, imbere y’ihema ry’ibonaniro ahagana aho izuba rirasira, barinde Ahera mu cyimbo cy’Abisirayeli baharindishijwe. Utari uwo muri bo wigira hafi yicwe.
kubara:3:39: 39.Ababazwe bose bo mu Balewi, abo Mose na Aroni babaze babitegetswe n’Uwiteka nk’uko imiryango yabo iri, abahungu n’abagabo bose bahereye ku bamaze ukwezi bavutse, bari inzovu ebyiri n’ibihumbi bibiri.
kubara:3:40: 40.Uwiteka abwira Mose ati “Bara abahungu b’imfura bose b’Abisirayeli, uhereye ku bamaze ukwezi bavutse, wandike umubare w’amazina yabo.
kubara:3:41: 41.Jyewe Uwiteka untoranirize Abalewi, babe ingurane z’imfura zose z’Abisirayeli, kandi umpe n’amatungo y’Abalewi, abe ingurane z’uburiza bw’amatungo y’Abisirayeli bwose.”
kubara:3:42: 42.Mose abara imfura zose z’Abisirayeli uko Uwiteka yamutegetse.
kubara:3:43: 43.Abahungu b’imfura bose babazwe bahereye ku bamaze ukwezi bavutse, umubare w’amazina yabo uba inzovu ebyiri n’ibihumbi bibiri na magana abiri na mirongo irindwi na batatu.
kubara:3:44: 44.Uwiteka abwira Mose ati
kubara:3:45: 45.“Tora Abalewi babe ingurane z’imfura z’Abisirayeli, utore n’amatungo y’Abalewi abe ingurane z’amatungo yabo. Abalewi babe ingurane z’amatungo yabo, Abalewi babe abanjye. Ndi Uwiteka.
kubara:3:46: 46.Kandi kugira ngo imfura z’Abisirayeli magana abiri na mirongo irindwi n’eshatu, zisāze umubare w’Abalewi zicungurwe,
kubara:3:47: 47.ubake shekeli eshanu z’imfura imwe, uzende zigezwe kuri shekeli y’Ahera. Ni yo gera makumyabiri.
kubara:3:48: 48.Uhe Aroni n’abana be ifeza z’incungu z’izo mpfura zisāzeho.”
kubara:3:49: 49.Mose yaka ifeza z’incungu imfura zisāze ku zacunguwe n’Abalewi.
kubara:3:50: 50.Ifeza yatse izo mpfura z’Abisirayeli ziba shekeli igihumbi na magana atatu na mirongo irindwi n’eshanu zigezwe ku y’Ahera.
kubara:3:51: 51.Izo feza z’incungu Mose aziha Aroni n’abana be uko ijambo ry’Uwiteka ryategetse, uko Uwiteka yategetse Mose.
kubara:4:1: Abalewi babarurwa, imirimo yabo isobanurwa1.Uwiteka abwira Mose na Aroni ati
kubara:4:2: 2.“Bara umubare w’Abakohati ubarobanuye mu Balewi bandi, ubabare nk’uko imiryango yabo iri, nk’uko amazu ya ba sekuru ari,
kubara:4:3: 3.abasāgije imyaka y’ubukuru mirongo itatu batarasāza mirongo itanu, abakwiriye gukora umurimo wo mu ihema ry’ibonaniro bose.
kubara:4:4: 4.Iyi abe ari yo mirimo Abakohati bakorera mu ihema ry’ibonaniro. Ni iy’ibyera cyane.
kubara:4:5: 5.“Uko bagiye kubambūra, Aroni ajye yinjirana n’abana be bamanure umwenda ukingiriza Ahera cyane, bawutwikirize isanduku y’Ibihamya,
kubara:4:6: 6.bawutwikireho igicirane cy’impu z’inyamaswa zitwa tahashi, bakirambureho umwenda w’umukara wa kabayonga musa, baseseke imijisho mu bifunga byayo.
kubara:4:7: 7.“Kandi ameza y’imitsima yo kumurikwa bayarambureho umwenda w’umukara wa kabayonga, bawushyireho amasahani n’udukombe, n’imperezo n’ibikombe byo gusukisha amaturo y’ibyokunywa, kandi n’iyo mitsima itaburaho na yo iwubeho.
kubara:4:8: 8.Babirambureho umwenda w’umuhemba, bawutwikireho igicirane cy’impu za tahashi, baseseke imijisho mu bifunga by’ayo meza.
kubara:4:9: 9.“Bende umwenda w’umukara wa kabayonga, bawutwikirize igitereko cy’amatabaza n’amatabaza yacyo, n’icyuma cyacyo gikuraho ibishirira, n’udusahani dushyirwaho ibishirira, n’ibisukisho by’amavuta byacyo bakoresha imirimo yacyo,
kubara:4:10: 10.bagihambirane n’ibintu byacyo byose mu gicirane cy’impu za tahashi, bagishyire ku biti bimeze nk’ingobyi.
kubara:4:11: 11.“Igicaniro cy’izahabu bakirambureho umwenda w’umukara wa kabayonga, bawutwikireho igicirane cy’impu za tahashi, baseseke imijisho mu bifunga byacyo.
kubara:4:12: 12.Kandi bende ibintu bakoresha byose bikoresherezwa Ahera, babihambire mu mwenda w’umukara wa kabayonga, babitwikireho igicirane cy’impu za tahashi, babishyire ku biti bimeze nk’ingobyi.
kubara:4:13: 13.Bayore ivu ku gicaniro, bakirambureho umwenda w’umuhengeri,
kubara:4:14: 14.bagishyireho ibintu byacyo byose bakoresha imirimo yacyo, ibintu bishyirwamo umuriro w’amakara, n’ibyuma by’ingobe byarura inyama, n’ibintu bayoza ivu, n’inzabya n’ibintu by’igicaniro byose. Bakirambureho igicirane cy’impu za tahashi kigitwikīre, baseseke imijisho mu bifunga byacyo.
kubara:4:15: 15.Aroni n’abana be nibamara gutwikīra iby’Ahera n’ibikoresherezwaho byose, abantu bagiye kubambūra, maze Abakohati babone kuza kubiremērwa. Ariko ntibagakore ku byera badapfa. “Ibyo abe ari byo Abakohati baremērwa byo mu ihema ry’ibonaniro.
kubara:4:16: 16.“Kandi ibyo Eleyazari mwene Aroni umutambyi arindishwa, bibe amavuta ya cya gitereko cy’amatabaza, n’umubavu mwiza w’ikivange, n’ituro ry’ifu ritaburaho, n’amavuta ya elayo yo gusīga, kandi arindishwe n’ubuturo bwera bwose n’ibiburimo byose, Ahera n’ibintu byaho.”
kubara:4:17: 17.Uwiteka abwira Mose na Aroni ati
kubara:4:18: 18.“Umuryango w’Abakohati urimo imiryango, ntimukawukuzeho ngo uve mu Balewi,
kubara:4:19: 19.ahubwo mujye mubagenzereza mutya kugira ngo babeho badapfa, nibegera ibyera cyane: Aroni n’abana be bajye binjiramo, babatoranye imirimo, umuntu wese umurimo we n’icyo aremērwa.
kubara:4:20: 20.Ariko bo ntibakinjizwe no kubona ibyera n’akanya nk’ako kumiraza badapfa.”
kubara:4:21: 21.Uwiteka abwira Mose ati
kubara:4:22: 22.“Bara umubare w’Abagerushoni na bo nk’uko amazu ya ba sekuru ari, nk’uko imiryango yabo iri,
kubara:4:23: 23.ubare abasāgije imyaka y’ubukuru mirongo itatu batarasāza mirongo itanu, abakwiriye gukora umurimo wo mu ihema ry’ibonaniro bose.
kubara:4:24: 24.Iyi abe ari yo mirimo imiryango y’Abagerushoni bakwiriye gukora, n’ibyo bakwiriye kuremērwa.
kubara:4:25: 25.Bajye baremērwa ibikombate bisakara ubuturo bwera, n’ihema ry’ibonaniro n’ikirisakara, n’igicirane cy’impu za tahashi gisakara hejuru y’icyo, n’umwenda ukinga umuryango w’ihema ry’ibonaniro,
kubara:4:26: 26.n’imyenda ikinzwe y’urugo rw’ubwo buturo, n’umwenda ukinga irembo ry’urwo rugo rugota ubuturo n’igicaniro, n’imigozi yabyo n’ibintu byose bifatanye na byo, kandi bajye bakora imirimo yabyo yose.
kubara:4:27: 27.Mu mirimo yabo, Abagerushoni bajye bategekwa na Aroni n’abana be, ku byo baremērwa byose, no ku mirimo bakora yose, mubarindishe ibyo bakwiriye kuremērwa byose.
kubara:4:28: 28.Iyo abe ari yo iba imirimo y’imiryango y’Abagerushoni yo mu ihema ry’ibonaniro, imirimo barindishijwe bajye bayikoreshwa na Itamari mwene Aroni umutambyi.
kubara:4:29: 29.“Abamerari ubabare nk’uko imiryango yabo iri, nk’uko amazu ya ba sekuru ari,
kubara:4:30: 30.ubare abasāgije imyaka y’ubukuru mirongo itatu batarasāza mirongo itanu, abakwiriye gukora umurimo wo mu ihema ry’ibonaniro bose.
kubara:4:31: 31.Ibi abe ari byo bategekwa kurinda no kuremērwa, abe ari yo iba imirimo yabo yo mu ihema ry’ibonaniro yose: imbaho z’imiganda y’ubuturo bwera n’imbumbe zazo, n’inkingi zazo n’imyobo zishingwamo,
kubara:4:32: 32.n’inkingi z’urugo rubugota n’imyobo zishingwamo, n’imambo zazo n’imigozi yazo, n’ibintu bifatanye na byo byose, n’ibyo gukoreshwa imirimo yabyo byose. Muvuge mu mazina ibintu bategekwa kurinda no kuremērwa.
kubara:4:33: 33.Iyo abe ari yo iba imirimo y’imiryango y’Abamerari, imirimo yabo yose yo mu ihema ry’ibonaniro. Bajye bayikoreshwa na Itamari mwene Aroni umutambyi.”
kubara:4:34: 34.Mose na Aroni n’abatware b’iteraniro babara Abakohati nk’uko imiryango yabo iri, nk’uko amazu ya ba sekuru ari.
kubara:4:35: 35.Babara abasāgije imyaka y’ubukuru mirongo itatu batarasāza mirongo itanu, abakwiriye gukora umurimo wo mu ihema ry’ibonaniro bose.
kubara:4:36: 36.Ababazwe bo muri bo nk’uko imiryango yabo iri, baba ibihumbi bibiri na magana arindwi na mirongo itanu.
kubara:4:37: 37.Abo ni bo babazwe bo mu miryango y’Abakohati, abakorera mu ihema ry’ibonaniro bose, abo Mose na Aroni babaze uko Uwiteka yategekeye mu kanwa ka Mose.
kubara:4:38: 38.Kandi ababazwe bo mu Bagerushoni nk’uko imiryango yabo iri, nk’uko amazu ya ba sekuru ari,
kubara:4:39: 39.bari abasāgije imyaka y’ubukuru mirongo itatu batarasāza mirongo itanu, abakwiriye gukora umurimo wo mu ihema ry’ibonaniro bose,
kubara:4:40: 40.ababazwe bo muri bo nk’uko imiryango yabo iri, nk’uko amazu ya ba sekuru ari, baba ibihumbi bibiri na magana atandatu na mirongo itatu.
kubara:4:41: 41.Abo ni bo babazwe bo mu miryango y’Abagerushoni, abakorera mu ihema ry’ibonaniro bose, abo Mose na Aroni babaze uko Uwiteka yategetse.
kubara:4:42: 42.Kandi ababazwe bo mu miryango y’Abamerari nk’uko imiryango yabo iri, nk’uko amazu ya ba sekuru ari,
kubara:4:43: 43.bari abasāgije imyaka y’ubukuru mirongo itatu batarasāza mirongo itanu, abakwiriye gukora umurimo wo mu ihema ry’ibonaniro bose,
kubara:4:44: 44.ababazwe bo muri bo bose nk’uko imiryango yabo iri, baba ibihumbi bitatu na magana abiri.
kubara:4:45: 45.Abo ni bo babazwe bo mu miryango y’Abamerari, abo Mose na Aroni babaze uko Uwiteka yategekeye mu kanwa ka Mose.
kubara:4:46: 46.Uyu ni wo mubare w’ababazwe bose bo mu Balewi, abo Mose na Aroni n’abatware b’Abisirayeli babaze nk’uko imiryango yabo iri, nk’uko amazu ya ba sekuru ari,
kubara:4:47: 47.basāgije imyaka y’ubukuru mirongo itatu batarasāza mirongo itanu, abakwiriye bose gukora umurimo wose wo mu ihema ry’ibonaniro cyangwa kuremērwa ibyo muri ryo.
kubara:4:48: 48.Ababazwe bo muri bo, baba ibihumbi munani na magana atanu na mirongo inani.
kubara:4:49: 49.Uko Uwiteka yabitegetse, Mose ababarisha umuntu wese nk’uko umurimo we uri, nk’uko ibyo akwiriye kuremērwa biri. Uko aba ari ko bababara uko Uwiteka yategetse Mose.
kubara:5:1: Amategeko ategekwa abanduza1.Uwiteka abwira Mose ati
kubara:5:2: 2.“Tegeka Abisirayeli bakure mu mahema yanyu umubembe wese n’uninda wese, n’uhumanyijwe n’intumbi wese.
kubara:5:3: 3.Naho baba abagabo cyangwa abagore, mujye mubakuramo mubajyane inyuma yaho, kugira ngo batanduza aho mubambye amahema ntuye hagati.”
kubara:5:4: 4.Abisirayeli bagenza batyo, babakura mu ngando zabo. Uko Uwiteka yategetse Mose aba ari ko Abisirayeli bakora.
kubara:5:5: 5.Uwiteka abwira Mose ati
kubara:5:6: 6.“Bwira Abisirayeli uti ‘Umugabo cyangwa umugore nakora icyaha cyose mu byo abantu bakora akagibwaho n’urubanza,
kubara:5:7: 7.yature icyaha yakoze kandi arihe icyamushyirishijeho urubanza, akirihe uwo yacumuyeho kitagabanije, kandi yongereho ikingana n’igice cyacyo cya gatanu.
kubara:5:8: 8.Ariko niba uwo muntu yacumuyeho atasize mwene wabo wa bugufi wariho icyashyirishije kuri wa wundi urubanza, Uwiteka abe ari we ukirihwa gihabwe umutambyi, cyongerweho isekurume y’intama y’impongano bamuhongerera.
kubara:5:9: 9.Ituro ryose ryererejwe ryo mu byera by’Abisirayeli bashyira umutambyi, rizabe irye bwite.
kubara:5:10: 10.Ibyera umuntu wese yejeje bizabe iby’umutambyi bwite, icyo umuntu aha umutambyi cyose kizabe icye bwite.’ ”
kubara:5:11: Itegeko ryo gushora umugore ufuhiwe11.Uwiteka abwira Mose ati
kubara:5:12: 12.“Bwira Abisirayeli uti ‘Umugore w’umuntu nahindukirira undi, agacumurisha ku mugabo we gusambana n’uwo,
kubara:5:13: 13.umugabo we ntabimenye bigahishwa, uwo mugore akaba yanduye ntihabe umushinja, ntabe afashwe akibikora,
kubara:5:14: 14.umugabo we agafatwa n’ifuhe agafuhira umugore we yanduye, cyangwa yafatwa n’ifuhe agafuhira umugore we atanduye koko,
kubara:5:15: 15.nuko uwo mugabo ashyire umutambyi umugore we, amumushyirane n’ituro amutangiriye ry’igice cya cumi cya efa y’ifu ya sayiri. Ntakayisukeho amavuta ya elayo, ntakayishyireho umubavu, kuko ari ituro ry’ifu riturishwa n’ifuhe, ituro ry’urwibutso rwibutsa gukiranirwa.
kubara:5:16: 16.“ ‘Umutambyi yigize uwo mugore hafi, amushyire imbere y’Uwiteka.
kubara:5:17: 17.Uwo mutambyi yendeshe amazi yera ikintu cy’ibumba, yende ku mukungugu wo hasi mu buturo bwera, awushyire muri ayo mazi.
kubara:5:18: 18.Ashyire uwo mugore imbere y’Uwiteka, amutendeze umusatsi, amushyire ku mashyi rya turo ry’urwibutso, ituro riturishwa n’ifuhe. Uwo mutambyi afate mu ntoki ayo mazi asharira, atera umuvumo,
kubara:5:19: 19.maze arahize uwo mugore amutongera ati: Niba ari nta mugabo mwasambanye, kandi niba utahindukiriye undi ngo wiyanduze ugitegekwa n’umugabo wawe, aya mazi asharira atera umuvumo ye kugira icyo agutwara.
kubara:5:20: 20.Ariko niba warahindukiriye undi ugitegekwa n’umugabo wawe nukaba wanduye, hakagira uwo mwaryamanye atari umugabo wawe,
kubara:5:21: 21.maze uwo mutambyi arahize uwo mugore indahiro yo kwivuma amutonga ati: Uwiteka aguhindurishe intukano n’indahiro mu bwoko bwawe kunyunyura ikibero cyawe, agatumbisha inda yawe.
kubara:5:22: 22.Kandi aya mazi atera umuvumo ari bujye mu mara yawe atumbishe inda yawe, anyunyure ikibero cyawe. “‘Uwo mugore yikirize ati “Amen, Amen.”
kubara:5:23: 23.“ ‘Uwo mutambyi yandike iyo mivumo mu gitabo, ayogeshe ayo mazi asharira.
kubara:5:24: 24.Anyweshe uwo mugore ayo mazi asharira atera umuvumo, ayo mazi atera umuvumo azamugeramo amusharirire.
kubara:5:25: 25.Umutambyi akure rya turo ry’ifu riturishwa n’ifuhe ku mashyi y’uwo mugore, arizungurize imbere y’Uwiteka, arijyane ku gicaniro.
kubara:5:26: 26.Yende kuri iryo turo iryuzuye urushyi, ribe urwibutso rwaryo, aryosereze ku gicaniro abone kunywesha uwo mugore ya mazi.
kubara:5:27: 27.Namara kuyamunywesha, bizaba bitya: niba yanduye akaba acumuye ku mugabo we, ayo mazi atera umuvumo azamugeramo, amusharirire atumbe inda, anyunyuke ikibero, uwo mugore ahinduke intukano mu bwoko bwe.
kubara:5:28: 28.Ariko niba atanduye, ahubwo akaba adahumanye nta cyo azaba, ntibizamubuza gusama inda.
kubara:5:29: 29.“ ‘Iryo ni ryo tegeko ry’ifuhe, ku mugore ugitegekwa n’umugabo we agahindukirira undi, akaba yanduye,
kubara:5:30: 30.no ku mugabo ufatwa n’ifuhe agafuhira umugore we. Ashyire uwo mugore imbere y’Uwiteka, umutambyi amugirire ibitegekwa n’iryo tegeko byose.
kubara:5:31: 31.Ni bwo uwo mugabo azaba akuweho gukiranirwa, umugore akaba ari we ugibwaho no gukiranirwa kwe.’ ”
kubara:6:1: Itegeko ry’Abanaziri1.Uwiteka abwira Mose ati
kubara:6:2: 2.“Bwira Abisirayeli uti ‘Umugabo cyangwa umugore niyirobanurisha mu bandi guhiga umuhigo wo kuba Umunaziri, ngo yiyereze Uwiteka,
kubara:6:3: 3.yitandukanye na vino n’ibisindisha bindi. Ntakanywe umushari wa vino cyangwa w’igishindisha kindi. Ntakanywe ibyokunywa by’uburyo bwose byaturutse mu nzabibu. Ntakarye inzabibu mbisi cyangwa zumye.
kubara:6:4: 4.Mu minsi yose y’ubunaziri bwe ntakarye ikintu cyose cyavuye ku muzabibu, naho kaba akabuto k’imbere y’inzabibu cyangwa igishishwa cyayo.
kubara:6:5: 5.“‘Mu minsi yose y’umuhigo w’ubunaziri bwe, icyuma cyogosha ntikikagere ku mutwe we. Iminsi yo kwera k’Uwiteka kwe itarashira abe uwera, areke umusatsi we uhirimbire.
kubara:6:6: 6.Mu minsi yose yo kwera k’Uwiteka kwe, ntakegere intumbi.
kubara:6:7: 7.Ntakihumanishe urupfu rwa se cyangwa rwa nyina, cyangwa rwa mwene se cyangwa rwa mushiki we, kuko kwiyereza Imana kwe kuri ku mutwe we.
kubara:6:8: 8.Mu minsi y’ubunaziri bwe yose, ahore ari uwerejwe Uwiteka.
kubara:6:9: 9.“‘Kandi nihagira umuntu upfa akanuka ari iruhande rwe, akanduza kwera kwe, aziyogosheshe ku munsi wo guhumanuka kwe, umunsi wa karindwi abe ari ho yiyogoshesha.
kubara:6:10: 10.Ku wa munani azane intungura ebyiri, cyangwa ibyana by’inuma bibiri ku muryango w’ihema ry’ibonaniro, abihe umutambyi.
kubara:6:11: 11.Maze umutambyi atambe kimwe ho igitambo gitambirwa ibyaha, ikindi agitambe ho igitambo cyoswa, amuhongerere impongano y’icyaha ya ntumbi yamuzaniye, amweze umutwe kuri uwo munsi.
kubara:6:12: 12.Umunaziri yongere yereze Uwiteka iminsi y’ubunaziri bwe: azane umwana w’intama utaramara umwaka ho igitambo cyo gukuraho urubanza, ariko iminsi yabanje izaba ipfuye ubusa, kuko ubunaziri bwe bwahumanijwe.
kubara:6:13: 13.“‘Iri ni ryo tegeko ry’Umunaziri rimutegeka, namara kurangiza iminsi y’ubunaziri bwe. Azanwe ku muryango w’ihema ry’ibonaniro,
kubara:6:14: 14.atambire Uwiteka ibitambo bye: umwana w’intama w’isekurume utaramara umwaka udafite inenge ho igitambo cyo koswa, n’uw’umwagazi utaramara umwaka udafite inenge ho igitambo cyo gutambira ibyaha, n’isekurume y’intama idafite inenge ho igitambo cy’uko ari amahoro,
kubara:6:15: 15.n’icyibo cy’imitsima itasembuwe, n’udutsima tw’ifu y’ingezi yavuganywe n’amavuta ya elayo, n’udutsima dusa n’amabango dusizweho amavuta ya elayo, bitambanwe n’ituro ry’ifu n’iry’ibyokunywa yo kuri byo.
kubara:6:16: 16.“‘Umutambyi abimurike imbere y’Uwiteka, atambire uwo muntu icyo gitambo gitambirwa ibyaha n’icyoswa.
kubara:6:17: 17.Kandi atambire Uwiteka n’iyo sekurume y’intama ho igitambo cy’uko uwo muntu ari amahoro, aturane na yo ya mitsima itasembuwe yo muri cya cyibo, kandi umutambyi aturane na byo ituro ry’ifu n’iry’ibyokunywa ryo kuri byo.
kubara:6:18: 18.Uwo Munaziri yiyogosheshereze umutwe we wejejwe ku muryango w’ihema ry’ibonaniro. Yende umusatsi wari ku mutwe we wejejwe, awushyire mu muriro uri munsi ya cya gitambo cy’uko ari amahoro.
kubara:6:19: 19.“‘Umutambyi yende urushyi rw’ukuboko rutetse rwa ya sekurume, n’umutsima umwe utasembuwe wo muri cya cyibo, n’agatsima kamwe katasembuwe gasa n’ibango, abishyire ku mashyi y’uwo Munaziri amaze kwiyogoshesha umutwe we wejejwe.
kubara:6:20: 20.Umutambyi abizungurize imbere y’Uwiteka, bibe ituro rijungujwe. Iryo ni ituro ryera, ni umwanya w’umutambyi hamwe n’inkoro ijungujwe n’urushyi rw’ukuboko rwererejwe. Ibyo birangiye Umunaziri abone kunywa vino.
kubara:6:21: 21.“‘Iryo ni ryo tegeko ry’uhiga umuhigo w’ubunaziri, n’iry’amaturo aturira Uwiteka ubunaziri bwe, utabariyeho ibyo yabasha gutura adategetswe. Umuhigo yahize awuhigure uko itegeko ry’ubunaziri bwe ritegeka.’ ”
kubara:6:22: Umugisha abatambyi basabiraga Abisirayeli22.Uwiteka abwira Mose ati
kubara:6:23: 23.“Bwira Aroni n’abana be, uti ‘Uku abe ari ko mujya muhesha Abisirayeli umugisha, muti:
kubara:6:24: 24.Uwiteka aguhe umugisha akurinde,

kubara:8:1: Amategeko y’Abalewi1.Uwiteka abwira Mose ati
kubara:8:2: 2.“Bwira Aroni uti ‘Nushyira ya matabaza ku gitereko cyayo, ajye amurikira imbere yacyo uko ari arindwi.’ ”
kubara:8:3: 3.Aroni abigenza atyo, ashyira ayo matabaza ku gitereko uburyo butuma amurikira imbere yacyo, uko Uwiteka yategetse Mose.
kubara:8:4: 4.Uku ni ko kuremwa kw’icyo gitereko cyaremwe mu izahabu icuzwe: uhereye ku ndiba yacyo n’uburabyo bwo kuri cyo cyaremwe mu izahabu icuzwe. Uko icyitegererezo cyari kiri Uwiteka yeretse Mose, aba ari ko Mose akiremesha.
kubara:8:5: 5.Uwiteka abwira Mose ati
kubara:8:6: 6.“Robanura Abalewi mu Bisirayeli ubahumanure.
kubara:8:7: 7.Ubagenzereze utya kugira ngo ubahumanure: ubamisheho amazi y’impongano y’ibyaha, biyogosheshe umubiri wose, bamese imyenda yabo bihumanure.
kubara:8:8: 8.Maze bende ikimasa cy’umusore, n’ituro ryo guturanwa na cyo ry’ifu y’ingezi yavuganywe n’amavuta ya elayo, wende n’ikimasa cy’umusore kindi ho igitambo cyo gutambirwa ibyaha.
kubara:8:9: 9.Umurike Abalewi imbere y’ihema ry’ibonaniro, uteranye iteraniro ry’Abisirayeli ryose.
kubara:8:10: 10.Umurike Abalewi imbere y’Uwiteka, Abisirayeli babarambikeho ibiganza.
kubara:8:11: 11.Aroni azungurize Abalewi imbere y’Uwiteka babe ituro rijungujwe, babe mu cyimbo cy’Abisirayeli, babe abo gukora umurimo w’Uwiteka.
kubara:8:12: 12.Abalewi barambike ibiganza mu mpanga z’ibyo bimasa: utambire Uwiteka kimwe ho igitambo gitambirwa ibyaha, n’ikindi ho igitambo cyoswa, ubihongerere Abalewi.
kubara:8:13: 13.“Ushyire Abalewi imbere ya Aroni n’abana be, ubazunguze babe ituro rijungurijwe Uwiteka.
kubara:8:14: 14.Uko abe ari ko utandukanya Abalewi n’Abisirayeli bandi, Abalewi babe abanjye.
kubara:8:15: 15.Maze Abalewi babone kwinjirira gukora imirimo yo mu ihema ry’ibonaniro. Ubahumanure, ubazunguze babe ituro rijungujwe,
kubara:8:16: 16.kuko mbahawe rwose mu Bisirayeli, mbītoreye gusubira mu cyimbo cy’abana b’uburiza bose, imfura z’Abisirayeli zose.
kubara:8:17: 17.Kuko uburiza bw’Abisirayeli bwose ari ubwanjye, ubw’abantu n’ubw’amatungo, nabwiyereje kuri wa munsi niciragaho uburiza bwo mu gihugu cya Egiputa bwose.
kubara:8:18: 18.None ntoye Abalewi mu cyimbo cy’imfura z’Abisirayeli zose.
kubara:8:19: 19.Kandi nahereye Aroni n’abana be Abalewi kugira ngo babe ababo mu Bisirayeli, bakorere mu ihema ry’ibonaniro imirimo ikwiriye Abisirayeli, bahongerere Abisirayeli kugira ngo Abisirayeli badaterwa n’umuze, nibigira hafi y’Ahera.”
kubara:8:20: 20.Uko ni ko Mose na Aroni n’iteraniro ry’Abisirayeli ryose bagenza Abalewi. Uko Uwiteka yategetse Mose ku by’Abalewi kose, abe ari ko Abisirayeli babagenza.
kubara:8:21: 21.Abalewi bihumanure ibyaha, bamese imyenda yabo, Aroni abazungurize imbere y’Uwiteka babe ituro rijungujwe, Aroni abahongererere kubahumanura.
kubara:8:22: 22.Maze Abalewi babona kwinjira gukora imirimo yabo yo mu ihema ry’ibonaniro imbere ya Aroni n’abana be. Uko Uwiteka yategetse Mose ku by’Abalewi, abe ari ko babagenza.
kubara:8:23: 23.Uwiteka abwira Mose ati
kubara:8:24: 24.“Ibi ni byo nkubwira ku Balewi: abamaze imyaka y’ubukuru makumyabiri n’itanu cyangwa isāga binjire mu bugaragu bw’ihema ry’ibonaniro, bajye barikoreramo imirimo.
kubara:8:25: 25.Nibamara imyaka y’ubukuru mirongo itanu, bave muri ubwo bugaragu be kugumya gukora imirimo iruhije.
kubara:8:26: 26.Ariko bajye bafasha bene wabo mu ihema ry’ibonaniro kurinda ibyo barindishijwe, be gukora imirimo iruhije. Uko abe ari ko ugenza Abalewi ku by’imirimo yabo.”
kubara:9:1: Andi mategeko ya Pasika1.Uwiteka abwirira Mose mu butayu bwa Sinayi, mu kwezi kwa mbere ko mu mwaka wa kabiri, uhereye aho baviriye mu gihugu cya Egiputa ati
kubara:9:2: 2.“Kandi Abisirayeli baziririze Pasika mu gihe cyayo cyategetswe.
kubara:9:3: 3.Ku munsi wa cumi n’ine w’uku kwezi nimugoroba, abe ari ho muzayiziririza nk’uko igihe cyayo cyategetswe. Muzayiziririze mukurikize amategeko yayo yose n’imigenzo yayo mwabwirijwe yose.”
kubara:9:4: 4.Mose abwira Abisirayeli ngo baziririze Pasika.
kubara:9:5: 5.Bayiziririza mu kwezi kwa mbere, ku munsi wako wa cumi n’ine nimugoroba, bari mu butayu bwa Sinayi. Uko Uwiteka yategetse Mose kose, aba ari ko Abisirayeli bagenza.
kubara:9:6: 6.Hariho abantu bahumanijwe n’intumbi y’umuntu, ntibabasha kuziririza Pasika kuri uwo munsi: baza imbere ya Mose na Aroni kuri uwo munsi,
kubara:9:7: 7.baramubwira bati “Twahumanijwe n’intumbi y’umuntu, ariko byatuburiza iki gutambira Uwiteka igitambo mu gihe cyacyo cyategetswe hamwe n’Abisirayeli bandi?”
kubara:9:8: 8.Mose arabasubiza ati “Nimube muretse mbaze numve icyo Uwiteka ari butegeke ibyanyu.”
kubara:9:9: 9.Uwiteka abwira Mose ati
kubara:9:10: 10.“Bwira Abisirayeli uti ‘Nihagira umuntu muri mwe cyangwa mu rubyaro rwanyu uhumanywa n’intumbi, cyangwa uri mu rugendo rwa kure, nubwo bimeze bityo, aziriririze Uwiteka Pasika.
kubara:9:11: 11.Mu kwezi kwa kabiri ku munsi wako wa cumi n’ine nimugoroba, abe ari ho bayiziriririza, bayirishe imitsima itasembuwe n’imboga zisharira,
kubara:9:12: 12.he kugira inyama zayo baraza ngo zigeze mu gitondo, kandi he kugira igufwa bavuna. Uko itegeko rya Pasika ryose riri abe ari ko bayiziririza.
kubara:9:13: 13.Ariko umuntu udahumanye kandi ntabe mu rugendo, akareka kuziririza Pasika azacibwe mu bwoko bwe. Kuko atatambiye Uwiteka icyo gitambo mu gihe cyacyo cyategetswe, uwo muntu azagibwaho n’icyaha cye.
kubara:9:14: 14.“ ‘Kandi umunyamahanga nasuhukira muri mwe agashaka kuziriririza Uwiteka Pasika, akurikize itegeko rya Pasika n’imigenzo yayo yabwirijwe: umunyamahanga na kavukire muzabasangize itegeko.’ ”
kubara:9:15: Inkingi y’igicu yayoboraga Abisirayeli mu rugendo rwabo (Kuva 40.34-38)15.Umunsi ubuturo bwera bwashinzwe, cya gicu gitwikira ubwo buturo, ari bwo Hema ry’Ibihamya, kandi nimugoroba kiba ku buturo gisa n’umuriro kigeza mu gitondo.
kubara:9:16: 16.Uko ni ko byabaga iminsi yose: cya gicu cyarabutwikiraga, nijoro kigasa n’umuriro.
kubara:9:17: 17.Kandi uko icyo gicu cyaterurwaga kuri iryo Hema, Abisirayeli babonaga kugenda, kandi aho cyahagararaga akaba ari ho Abisirayeli babamba amahema.
kubara:9:18: 18.Itegeko ry’Uwiteka ni ryo ryahagurutsaga Abisirayeli, kandi akaba ari ryo ribabambisha amahema. Igihe cyose icyo gicu cyamaraga ku buturo bwera, bakimaraga aho babambye amahema.
kubara:9:19: 19.Iyo icyo gicu cyamaraga iminsi myinshi ku buturo, Abisirayeli bitonderaga icyo Uwiteka yabihanangirije ntibagende.
kubara:9:20: 20.Ubundi icyo gicu cyamaraga iminsi mike ku buturo, maze itegeko ry’Uwiteka rikabagumisha aho babambye amahema akaba ari ryo ribahagurutsa.
kubara:9:21: 21.Ubundi cyabugumagaho gihereye nimugoroba kikageza mu gitondo, cyabuterurwaho mu gitondo bagahaguruka. Cyangwa cyabwirirwaho kikaburaraho, maze kikabuterurwaho bagahaguruka.
kubara:9:22: 22.Naho yaba iminsi ibiri cyangwa ukwezi cyangwa umwaka, iyo icyo gicu cyatindaga ku buturo bwera kikabugumaho, Abisirayeli bagumaga aho babambye amahema ntibagende, maze cyabuterurwaho bagahaguruka bakagenda.
kubara:9:23: 23.Itegeko ry’Uwiteka ni ryo ryababambishaga amahema, kandi akaba ari ryo ribahagurutsa. Bitonderaga ibyo Uwiteka yabihanangirije, uko Uwiteka yabategekeye mu kanwa ka Mose.
kubara:10:1: Amakondera y’ifeza1.Uwiteka abwira Mose ati
kubara:10:2: 2.“Rema amakondera abiri mu ifeza icuzwe, uyareme mu ifeza icuzwe, akubere ayo guhamagaza iteraniro n’ayo guhagurutsa ab’ibyiciro by’amahema.
kubara:10:3: 3.Uko bazayavuza, iteraniro ryose rijye riguteraniraho ku muryango w’ihema ry’ibonaniro.
kubara:10:4: 4.Nibavuza rimwe risa, ba batware, abakuru b’ibihumbi by’Abisirayeli bajye baguteraniraho.
kubara:10:5: 5.Kandi nimuvuza ijwi rirenga, ibyiciro byo mu ruhande rw’iburasirazuba bijye bihaguruka.
kubara:10:6: 6.Nimwongera kuvuza ijwi rirenga, ibyiciro byo mu ruhande rw’ikusi bijye bihaguruka. Ijwi rirenga bajye barivugiriza kubahagurutsa.
kubara:10:7: 7.Ariko nimushaka guteranya iteraniro mujye muvuza ayo makondera, ariko ntimukayavuze ijwi rirenga rirandaze.
kubara:10:8: 8.“Bene Aroni abatambyi bajye bavuza ayo makondera, bibabere itegeko ridakuka mu bihe byanyu byose.
kubara:10:9: 9.Kandi nimutabara mu gihugu cyanyu gutera ababisha babagirira nabi, muzajye muvuza ayo makondera ijwi rirenga rirandaze. Nuko muzibukwa n’Uwiteka Imana yanyu, mukizwe ababisha banyu.
kubara:10:10: 10.Kandi mu gihe cy’umunezero wanyu, no mu minsi mikuru yanyu, no mu mboneko z’amezi yanyu, mujye muvuza ayo makondera mu itamba ry’ibitambo byanyu by’uko muri amahoro, nuko azababera urwibutso rubibukisha imbere y’Imana yanyu. Ndi Uwiteka Imana yanyu.”
kubara:10:11: Abisirayeli bakurikira igicu11.Mu mwaka wa kabiri mu kwezi kwawo kwa kabiri, ku munsi wako wa makumyabiri, cya gicu giterurwa ku buturo bw’Ibihamya.
kubara:10:12: 12.Abisirayeli barahaguruka bava mu butayu bwa Sinayi, bakurikije ibyo bari bategetswe by’urugendo, icyo gicu gihagarara mu butayu bwa Parani.
kubara:10:13: 13.Uko ni ko guhaguruka kwabo kwa mbere, bagenda uko bategekewe n’Uwiteka mu kanwa ka Mose.
kubara:10:14: 14.Habanza guhaguruka ibendera ry’icyiciro cy’Abayuda nk’uko imitwe yabo iri. Umutware w’umutwe w’Abayuda yari Nahashoni mwene Aminadabu.
kubara:10:15: 15.Umutware w’umutwe w’umuryango w’Abisakari yari Netanēli mwene Suwari.
kubara:10:16: 16.Umutware w’umutwe w’umuryango w’Abazebuluni yari Eliyabu mwene Heloni.
kubara:10:17: 17.Ubuturo bwera burashingurwa, Abagerushoni n’Abamerari bagenda baburemērewe.
kubara:10:18: 18.Ibendera ry’icyiciro cy’Abarubeni rihaguruka nk’uko imitwe yabo iri. Umutware w’umutwe w’Abarubeni yari Elisuri mwene Shedewuri.
kubara:10:19: 19.Umutware w’umutwe w’umuryango w’Abasimeyoni yari Shelumiyeli mwene Surishadayi.
kubara:10:20: 20.Umutware w’umutwe w’umuryango w’Abagadi yari Eliyasafu mwene Deweli.
kubara:10:21: 21.Abakohati bahaguruka baremērewe iby’Ahera, basanga ubuturo bamaze kubushinga.
kubara:10:22: 22.Ibendera ry’icyiciro cy’Abefurayimu rihaguruka nk’uko imitwe yabo iri. Umutware w’umutwe w’Abefurayimu yari Elishama mwene Amihudi.
kubara:10:23: 23.Umutware w’umutwe w’umuryango w’Abamanase yari Gamaliyeli mwene Pedasuri.
kubara:10:24: 24.Umutware w’umutwe w’umuryango w’Ababenyamini yari Abidani mwene Gideyoni.
kubara:10:25: 25.Ibendera ry’icyiciro cy’Abadani riba ari ryo risezera ibyiciro byose, rihaguruka nk’uko imitwe yabo iri. Umutware w’umutwe w’Abadani yari Ahiyezeri mwene Amishadayi.
kubara:10:26: 26.Umutware w’umutwe w’umuryango w’Abashēri yari Pagiyeli mwene Okirani.
kubara:10:27: 27.Umutware w’umutwe w’Abanafutali yari Ahira mwene Enani.
kubara:10:28: 28.Uko aba ari ko Abisirayeli bakurikirana mu rugendo nk’uko imitwe yabo iri; uko aba ari ko bahaguruka.
kubara:10:29: Mose asaba muramu we kujyana na bo29.Mose abwira Hobabu mwene Reweli Umumidiyani, sebukwe wa Mose ati “Turajya mu gihugu Uwiteka yatubwiye ko azaduha. Ngwino tujyane tukugirire ibyiza, kuko Uwiteka yasezeranije kugirira Abisirayeli neza.”
kubara:10:30: 30.Aramusubiza ati “Ntituri bujyane, ahubwo ndasubira mu gihugu cyacu muri bene wacu.”
kubara:10:31: 31.Aramubwira ati “Ndakwinginze widusiga, kuko uzi yuko tugiye kujya tubamba amahema mu butayu, nawe uzaba amaso yacu.
kubara:10:32: 32.Kandi nujyana natwe, ibyiza Uwiteka azatugirira natwe tuzabikugirira.”
kubara:10:33: 33.Barahaguruka bava ku musozi w’Uwiteka bagenda urugendo rw’iminsi itatu, isanduku y’isezerano ry’Uwiteka ibajya imbere, igenda urugendo rw’iminsi itatu ibashakira aho gusibira.
kubara:10:34: 34.Cya gicu cy’Uwiteka cyabaga hejuru yabo ku manywa, iyo bahagurukaga bakabambūra.
kubara:10:35: 35.Uko iyo sanduku yahagurukaga Mose yaravugaga ati “Uwiteka haguruka ababisha bawe batatane, abanzi bawe baguhunge.”
kubara:10:36: 36.Yahagarara akavuga ati “Uwiteka garukira inzovu z’ibihumbi by’Abisirayeli.”
kubara:11:1: Abisirayeli baritotomba, umuriro w’Uwiteka wicamo benshi1.Ubwo bwoko buritotomba, Uwiteka yumva ko ari bibi. Abyumvise uburakari bwe burakongezwa, umuriro w’Uwiteka wicāna muri bo, ukongora abo ku iherezo ry’amagando yabo.
kubara:11:2: 2.Abantu batakira Mose, asenga Uwiteka uwo muriro urazima.
kubara:11:3: 3.Aho hantu bahita Tabera, kuko umuriro w’Uwiteka wicānye muri bo.
kubara:11:4: Abisirayeli banga manu basaba Mose inyama, ariganyira4.Abanyamahanga y’ikivange bari hagati y’Abisirayeli batangira kwifuza, Abisirayeli na bo bongera kurira, baravuga bati “Ni nde uzaduha inyama zo kurya?
kubara:11:5: 5.Twibutse ya mafi twariraga ubusa tukiri muri Egiputa, n’amadegede n’amapapayi, n’ubutunguru bw’ibibabi by’ibibati n’ubutunguru bw’ibijumba, n’udutungurucumu.
kubara:11:6: 6.Ariko none turumye nta cyo dufite, nta kindi tureba kitari manu.”
kubara:11:7: 7.Manu iyo yasaga n’utubuto tw’ibyatsi byitwa gadi, ishusho yayo yasaga n’iy’ubushishi buva ku giti bwitwa budola.
kubara:11:8: 8.Abantu barazereraga bakayiteranya, bakayisya cyangwa bakayisekura, bakayiteka mu nkono bakayihindura udutsima. Kuryoha kwayo kwari nk’uk’udutsima twavuganywe n’amavuta ya elayo.
kubara:11:9: 9.Ikime nijoro cyatonda aho babambye amahema, manu igatondana na cyo.
kubara:11:10: 10.Mose yumva abantu barira, umuntu wese arirana n’inzu ye barira mu miryango y’amahema yabo. Uburakari bw’Uwiteka bukongezwa cyane, bibabaza Mose.
kubara:11:11: 11.Mose abwira Uwiteka ati “Ni iki gituma ugirira nabi umugaragu wawe? Ni iki kimbujije kukugiriraho umugisha, ukanyikoreza aba bantu bose ho umutwaro?
kubara:11:12: 12.Nasamye inda y’ubu bwoko bwose se, ni jye wababyaye ko untegeka kubaterura, nkabatengamatira mu gituza, nk’uko umurezi w’umugabo atengamatira umwana wonka, nkabajyana mu gihugu wasezeranije ba sekuruza?
kubara:11:13: 13.Nakura he inyama zo kugaburira ubu bwoko bwose, ko bandirira imbere bati ‘Duhe inyama tuzirye’?
kubara:11:14: 14.Sinabasha guheka ubu bwoko bwose jyenyine, kuko buremereye simbushobore.
kubara:11:15: 15.Niba ungenza uty ndakwingize nyica mveho, niba nkugiriyeho umugisha ne kubona ibyago byanjye.”
kubara:11:16: Uwiteka aha Mose abafasha mirongo irindwi16.Uwiteka abwira Mose ati “Nteraniriza abagabo mirongo irindwi bo mu bakuru b’Abisirayeli, abo uzi ko ari abakuru b’abantu koko n’abatware babo, ubazane ku ihema ry’ibonaniro bahagararaneho nawe.
kubara:11:17: 17.Nanjye ndi bumanuke mvuganireyo nawe, nende ku Mwuka ukuriho mubashyireho. Na bo bazajya bahekana nawe uwo mutwaro w’abantu, we kuwuheka wenyine.
kubara:11:18: 18.Kandi bwira abantu uti: Mwiyereze umunsi w’ejo kandi muzarya inyama, kuko muririye ku matwi y’Uwiteka mukavuga muti ‘Ni nde uzaduha inyama zo kurya, ko twari tumereye neza muri Egiputa?’ Ni cyo gitumye Uwiteka azabaha inyama mukazirya.
kubara:11:19: 19.Ntimuzazirya umunsi umwe cyangwa ibiri cyangwa itanu, cyangwa icumi cyangwa makumyabiri,
kubara:11:20: 20.ahubwo muzazirya ukwezi kose mugeze aho zizabatungukira mu mazuru zikababihira, kuko mwanze Uwiteka uri muri mwe, mukamuririra imbere muti ‘Twaviriye iki muri Egiputa?’ ”
kubara:11:21: 21.Mose aramusubiza ati “Ubwoko ndi hagati ni abagabo bigenza uduhumbi dutandatu, umva ko uvuze uti ‘Nzabaha inyama bazirye ukwezi kose.’
kubara:11:22: 22.Bazababagira imikumbi n’amashyo byo kubahaza? Cyangwa amafi yo mu nyanja yose azabateranirizwa yo kubahaza?”
kubara:11:23: 23.Uwiteka abwira Mose ati “Mbese amaboko y’Uwiteka abaye magufi? None urareba yuko ijambo ryanjye rigusohorera, cyangwa ritagusohorera.”
kubara:11:24: Abafasha ba Mose barahanura: yanga kugira ishyari24.Mose arasohoka abwira abantu ayo magambo y’Uwiteka, kandi ateranya abagabo mirongo irindwi bo mu bakuru b’abantu, abagotesha ihema ryera.
kubara:11:25: 25.Uwiteka amanukira muri cya gicu avugana na we, yenda ku Mwuka umuriho, amushyira kuri abo bakuru uko ari mirongo irindwi. Nuko Umwuka abaguyeho barahanura, bagarukiriza aho.
kubara:11:26: 26.Maze mu ngando zabo hasigara abagabo babiri, umwe yitwa Eludadi, undi yitwa Medadi. Umwuka abagwaho, kandi bari mu mubare w’abanditswe ariko batavuye aho ngo bajye ku ihema ryera, bahanurira aho mu ngando.
kubara:11:27: 27.Umuhungu w’umusore agenda yiruka abwira Mose ati “Eludadi na Medadi barahanurira mu ngando.”
kubara:11:28: 28.Yosuwa mwene Nuni, wari umufasha wa Mose uhereye mu busore bwe, aramubwira ati “Databuja Mose, babuze.”
kubara:11:29: 29.Mose aramubaza ati “Ni jye urwaniye ishyaka? Icyampa ab’ubwoko bw’Uwiteka bose bakaba abahanuzi, Uwiteka akabashyiraho Umwuka we!”
kubara:11:30: 30.Mose asubirana mu ngando n’abakuru ba Isirayeli.
kubara:11:31: Abisirayeli bahabwa inyama, bahanwa31.Umuyaga uturuka ku Uwiteka, uzana inturumbutsi zivuye ku nyanja, uzigusha aho babambye amahema n’impande zose, zigeza aho umuntu yagenda urugendo rw’umunsi umwe, ikirundo cyazo kireshya n’intambwe enye z’intoki.
kubara:11:32: 32.Abantu barahaguruka, biriza uwo munsi bazitoragura bakesha ijoro, biriza n’undi munsi. Uwatoraguye nke aba atoraguye homeru cumi. Bazanika hose impande zose z’ingando zabo.
kubara:11:33: 33.Inyama bakizishinze amenyo bataramara kuzitapfuna, uburakari bw’Uwiteka bukongerezwa abantu, abatera mugiga ikomeye cyane.
kubara:11:34: 34.Aho hantu bahita Kiburotihatava, kuko ari ho bahambye abifuzaga.
kubara:11:35: 35.Abantu bahaguruka i Kiburotihatava bajya i Haseroti, bahamara iminsi.
kubara:12:1: Uwiteka ateza Miriyamu ibibembe, Mose aramusabira1.Miriyamu na Aroni banegura Mose ku bw’Umunyetiyopiyakazi yarongoye. Koko yari yararongoye Umunyetiyopiyakazi.
kubara:12:2: 2.Baravuga bati “Ni ukuri Uwiteka avugira mu kanwa ka Mose musa? Twe ntatuvugiramo?” Uwiteka arabyumva.
kubara:12:3: 3.Kandi uwo mugabo Mose yari umugwaneza urusha abantu bo mu isi bose.
kubara:12:4: 4.Uwiteka atungura Mose na Aroni na Miriyamu ati “Nimusohoke uko muri batatu, muze ku ihema ry’ibonaniro.” Barasohoka uko ari batatu.
kubara:12:5: 5.Uwiteka amanukira mu nkingi y’igicu, ahagarara mu muryango w’Ihema ryera, ahamagara Aroni na Miriyamu, bombi baraza.
kubara:12:6: 6.Arababwira ati “Nimwumve amagambo yanjye: niba muri mwe hazabamo umuhanuzi, mu iyerekwa ni ho Uwiteka nzamwimenyeshereza, mu nzozi ni ho nzavuganira na we.
kubara:12:7: 7.Umugaragu wanjye Mose si ko ameze, akiranuka mu rugo rwanjye hose.
kubara:12:8: 8.Uwo we tujya twivuganira n’akanwa kacu neruye, atari mu migani, kandi ishusho y’Uwiteka ajya ayibona. Nuko ni iki cyabatinyuye kunegura umugaragu wanjye Mose?”
kubara:12:9: 9.Bikongereza uburakari bw’Uwiteka, aragenda.
kubara:12:10: 10.Cya gicu kiva hejuru y’Ihema ryera kiragenda, Miriyamu asesa ibibembe byera nk’urubura. Aroni ahindukirira Miriyamu, abona asheshe ibibembe.
kubara:12:11: 11.Aroni abwira Mose ati “Databuja ndakwingize, we kudushyiraho igihano cy’icyaha twakoreshejwe n’ubupfu, tukizanira urubanza.
kubara:12:12: 12.Ndakwingize, ye kumera nk’igihwereye kivutse kiboze mu ruhande rumwe.”
kubara:12:13: 13.Mose atakira Uwiteka ati “Mana ndakwingize, mukize.”
kubara:12:14: 14.Uwiteka asubiza Mose ati “Iyaba se yamuciriye mu maso gusa, ntiyakozwe n’isoni iminsi irindwi? Bamukingiranire inyuma y’ingando z’amahema, amare iminsi irindwi abone kuhagarurwa.”
kubara:12:15: 15.Bakingiranira Miriyamu inyuma y’ingando amara iminsi irindwi, ubwo bwoko ntibwahaguruka, Miriyamu atarahagarurwa.
kubara:12:16: 16.Nyuma ubwo bwoko burahaguruka buva i Haseroti, bubamba amahema mu butayu bwa Parani.
kubara:13:1: Abatasi cumi na babiri bajya gutata i Kanāni (Guteg 1.19-33)1.Uwiteka abwira Mose ati
kubara:13:2: 2.“Tuma abantu batate igihugu cy’i Kanāni, icyo mpa Abisirayeli. Ukure umuntu mu muryango wa ba sekuruza wose, umuntu wese ari umutware wabo.”
kubara:13:3: 3.Mose abatuma ari mu butayu bwa Parani, uko Uwiteka yategetse. Abo yatumye bose bari abatware b’Abisirayeli.
kubara:13:4: 4.Aya ni yo mazina yabo: Mu muryango wa Rubeni hatumwa Shamuwa mwene Zakuri.
kubara:13:5: 5.Mu muryango wa Simiyoni hatumwa Shafati mwene Hori.
kubara:13:6: 6.Mu muryango wa Yuda hatumwa Kalebu mwene Yefune.
kubara:13:7: 7.Mu muryango wa Isakari hatumwa Igalu mwene Yosefu.
kubara:13:8: 8.Mu muryango wa Efurayimu hatumwa Hoseya mwene Nuni.
kubara:13:9: 9.Mu muryango wa Benyamini hatumwa Paluti mwene Rafu.
kubara:13:10: 10.Mu muryango wa Zebuluni hatumwa Gadiyeli mwene Sodi.
kubara:13:11: 11.Mu muryango wa Yosefu, ni wo muryango wa Manase, hatumwa Gadi mwene Susi.
kubara:13:12: 12.Mu muryango wa Dani hatumwa Amiyeli mwene Gemali.
kubara:13:13: 13.Mu muryango wa Asheri hatumwa Seturi mwene Mikayeli.
kubara:13:14: 14.Mu muryango wa Nafutali hatumwa Nakibi mwene Vofusi.
kubara:13:15: 15.Mu muryango wa Gadi hatumwa Geweli mwene Maki.
kubara:13:16: 16.Ayo ni yo mazina y’abantu Mose yatumye gutata icyo igihugu. Mose yita Hoseya mwene Nuni, Yosuwa.
kubara:13:17: 17.Mose abatuma gutata igihugu cy’i Kanāni, arababwira ati “Muzamukire muri iyi nzira ica i Negebu, muzamuke mu gihugu cy’imisozi miremire.
kubara:13:18: 18.Mutate igihugu mumenye uko kimeze, n’abantu bagituyemo mumenye yuko ari abanyamaboko cyangwa ari abanyamaboko make, kandi yuko ari bake cyangwa ari benshi,
kubara:13:19: 19.n’igihugu batuyemo yuko ari cyiza cyangwa ari kibi, n’imidugudu batuyemo uko imeze, yuko itagoteshejwe inkike z’amabuye cyangwa izigoteshejwe,
kubara:13:20: 20.n’ubutaka bw’icyo gihugu uko bumeze, yuko bwera cyangwa burumba, kandi yuko igihugu kirimo ibiti cyangwa bitarimo. Mushire ubwoba muzane ku mbuto z’icyo gihugu.” Icyo gihe cyari igihe inzabibu za mbere zihishiriza.
kubara:13:21: 21.Nuko barazamuka batata icyo gihugu bahereye mu butayu bwa Zini, bageza i Rehobu ihereranye n’urugabano rw’i Hamati.
kubara:13:22: 22.Barazamuka banyura Negebu, bagera i Heburoni, Abānaki na Ahimani na Sheshayi na Talumayi bari bariyo. Heburoni hamaze imyaka irindwi hubatswe, Sowani yo muri Egiputa irubakwa.
kubara:13:23: 23.Bagera mu gikombe cya Eshikoli, batemayo ishami ririho iseri rimwe ry’inzabibu, abantu babiri bariheka ku giti, kandi bazana ku makomamanga no ku mbuto z’imitini.
kubara:13:24: 24.Aho hantu hitirwa igikombe cya Eshikoli iryo seri Abisirayeli batemyeyo.
kubara:13:25: 25.Bamaze gutata igihugu, bagaruka hashize iminsi mirongo ine.
kubara:13:26: Icumi rizana inkuru y’incamugongo ya cyo; Kalebu abahana26.Basohoye basanga Mose na Aroni n’iteraniro ry’Abisirayeli ryose i Kadeshi mu butayu bwa Parani, bababwirana n’iteraniro ryose ibyo babonye, babereka za mbuto z’igihugu.
kubara:13:27: 27.Batekerereza Mose bati “Twageze mu gihugu wadutumyemo, ni ukuri koko ni icy’amata n’ubuki, ngizi imbuto zacyo.
kubara:13:28: 28.Ariko abantu bagituyemo ni abanyamaboko, kandi imidugudu yabo igoteshejwe inkike z’amabuye, kandi ni minini cyane, kandi twabonyeyo Abānaki.
kubara:13:29: 29.Abamaleki batuye mu gihugu cy’i Negebu, Abaheti n’Abayebusi n’Abamori batuye mu misozi, Abanyakanāni batuye ku Nyanja no mu bibaya bya Yorodani.”
kubara:13:30: 30.Kalebu ahoreza abantu imbere ya Mose, ati “Tuzamuke nonaha tuhahindūre, kuko tubasha rwose kuhatsinda.”
kubara:13:31: 31.Maze abantu bari bajyanye na we baravuga bati “Ntitwabasha kuzamuka ngo turwanye abo bantu, kuko baturusha amaboko.”
kubara:13:32: 32.Babarira Abisirayeli inkuru y’incamugongo y’igihugu batase, bati “Igihugu twanyuzemo tugitata ni igihugu cy’umwiryane, kandi abantu twakibonyemo bose ni barebare.
kubara:13:33: 33.Kandi twabonyemo abantu barebare banini, Abānaki bakomotse mu bantu barebare banini. Twibonaga tubamezeho nk’inzige, na bo bakabona tumeze nka zo.”
kubara:14:1: Abisirayeli banga kujya i Kanāni1.Iteraniro ryose ritera hejuru, rirataka, abantu iryo joro bararira.
kubara:14:2: 2.Abisirayeli bose bitotombera Mose na Aroni, iteraniro ryose rirababwira riti “Iyaba twaraguye mu gihugu cya Egiputa! Cyangwa iyaba twaraguye muri ubu butayu!
kubara:14:3: 3.Uwiteka atujyanira iki muri icyo gihugu, kugira ngo tuhicirwe n’inkota? Abagore bacu n’abana bacu bazaba iminyago, ikiruta si uko twasubira muri Egiputa?”
kubara:14:4: 4.Baravugana bati “Twishyirireho umugaba dusubire muri Egiputa.”
kubara:14:5: 5.Maze Mose na Aroni bikubitira hasi bubamye, imbere y’iteraniro ry’Abisirayeli ryose ryari riteraniye aho.
kubara:14:6: 6.Yosuwa mwene Nuni na Kalebu mwene Yefune bari mu mubare w’abatase icyo gihugu, bashishimura imyenda yabo,
kubara:14:7: 7.babwira iteraniro ry’Abisirayeli ryose bati “Igihugu twaciyemo tugitata ni cyiza cyane.
kubara:14:8: 8.Niba Uwiteka atwishimira, azatujyana muri icyo gihugu akiduhe kandi ari igihugu cy’amata n’ubuki.
kubara:14:9: 9.Icyakora ntimugomere Uwiteka kandi ntimutinye bene icyo gihugu: tuzabarya nk’imitsima, ntibagifite ikibakingira kandi Uwiteka ari mu ruhande rwacu, ntimubatinye.”
kubara:14:10: 10.Iteraniro ryose ritegeka ko babicisha amabuye. Maze ubwiza bw’Uwiteka bubonekera Abisirayeli bose buri mu ihema ry’ibonaniro.
kubara:14:11: Uwiteka ategeka ko Abisirayeli bazagwa mu butayu11.Uwiteka abwira Mose ati “Ubu bwoko buzageza he kunsuzugura? Buzageza he kutanyizezwa n’ibimenyetso byose nakoreye hagati muri bo?
kubara:14:12: 12.Ndabateza mugiga, mbakureho umwandu wabo, nkugire ubwoko bubaruta ubwinshi, bubarusha amaboko.”
kubara:14:13: 13.Mose abwira Uwiteka ati “Abanyegiputa bazabyumva, kuko wakuje ubu bwoko muri bo amaboko yawe,
kubara:14:14: 14.babibwire bene icyo gihugu. Barumvise yuko wowe Uwiteka uri hagati muri ubu bwoko, kuko wowe Uwiteka ubonwa n’amaso, kandi igicu cyawe gihagarara hejuru yabo, ukajya imbere yabo uri mu nkingi y’igicu ku manywa, no mu nkingi y’umuriro nijoro.
kubara:14:15: 15.None niwica ubu bwoko nk’umuntu umwe, amahanga yumvise inkuru yawe azavuga ati
kubara:14:16: 16.‘Uwiteka yananiwe kujyana ubwo bwoko mu gihugu yarahiye ko azabuha, icyo ni cyo cyatumye abwicira mu butayu.’
kubara:14:17: 17.None imbaraga z’umwami wanjye ziyerekane ko ari nyinshi nk’uko wavuze uti
kubara:14:18: 18.‘Uwiteka atinda kurakara, afite kugira neza kwinshi, ababarira gukiranirwa n’ibicumuro, ntatsindishiriza na hato abo gutsindwa, ahōra abana gukiranirwa kwa ba se akageza ku buzukuruza n’ubuvivi.’
kubara:14:19: 19.Babarira gukiranirwa k’ubu bwoko nk’uko imbabazi zawe ari nyinshi, nk’uko wabubabariraga uhereye igihe baviriye mu Egiputa ukageza ubu.”
kubara:14:20: 20.Uwiteka aramubwira ati “Ndabababariye nk’uko unsabye.
kubara:14:21: 21.Ariko ni ukuri ndahiye guhoraho kwanjye n’uko isi yose izuzura icyubahiro cy’Uwiteka,
kubara:14:22: 22.kuko abo bantu bose babonye icyubahiro cyanjye n’ubwiza bwanjye, n’ibimenyetso nakoreye muri Egiputa no mu butayu, bakangerageza ibi bihe uko ari icumi ntibanyumvire.
kubara:14:23: 23.Ni ukuri ntibazabona igihugu narahiye ba sekuruza ko nzakibaha, nta n’umwe wo mu bansuzuguye uzakibona,
kubara:14:24: 24.keretse umugaragu wanjye Kalebu, kuko yari afite undi mutima, agakurikira uko muyobora muri byose, nzamujyana mu gihugu yagiyemo, urubyaro rwe ruzakigira gakondo.
kubara:14:25: 25.Abamaleki n’Abanyakanāni batuye muri kiriya gikombe, ejo muzahindukire musubire mu butayu mu nzira ijya ku Nyanja Itukura.”
kubara:14:26: 26.Uwiteka abwira Mose na Aroni ati
kubara:14:27: 27.“Nzageza he kwihanganira iri teraniro ribi rinyitotombera? Numvise kwitotomba kw’Abisirayeli banyitotombera.
kubara:14:28: 28.Babwire uti ‘Uwiteka aravuga ati: Ndahiye guhoraho kwanjye yuko ntazabura kubagirira ibyo mwavugiye mu matwi yanjye.
kubara:14:29: 29.Intumbi zanyu zizagwa muri ubu butayu: ababazwe mwese, abamaze imyaka makumyabiri n’abayisāgije mwese mwanyitotombeye.
kubara:14:30: 30.Ni ukuri ntimuzajya mu gihugu narahirishije kumanika ukuboko yuko nzabatuzamo, keretse Kalebu mwene Yefune na Yosuwa mwene Nuni.
kubara:14:31: 31.Ariko abana banyu bato mwavuze ko bazaba iminyago, abo ni bo nzakijyanamo bamenye igihugu mwanze.
kubara:14:32: 32.Ariko mwe, intumbi zanyu zizagwa muri ubu butayu.
kubara:14:33: 33.Kandi abana banyu bazamara imyaka mirongo ine baragira amatungo mu butayu, bazagendana igihano cyo kurarikira kwanyu kwinshi, bageze aho imibiri yanyu izaba irimbukiye mu butayu.
kubara:14:34: 34.Nk’uko iminsi ingana mwatatiyemo icyo gihugu uko ari mirongo ine, umunsi uzahwana n’umwaka. Ni yo muzamara muriho igihano cyo gukiranirwa kwanyu kwinshi uko imyaka ari mirongo ine, kandi muzamenya ko nabahindutse.’
kubara:14:35: 35.Jyewe Uwiteka ndabivuze: sinzabura kugenza ntyo iri teraniro ribi ryose riteraniye kundwanya. Bazarimbukira muri ubu butayu, ni mo bazapfira.”
kubara:14:36: 36.Ba bagabo Mose yatumye gutata icyo gihugu, bakagaruka bakabara inkuru y’incamugongo yacyo, bigatuma iteraniro ryose rimwitotombera,
kubara:14:37: 37.abo bagabo babaze inkuru y’incamugongo y’icyo gihugu, bicirwa na mugiga imbere y’Uwiteka.
kubara:14:38: 38.Ariko Yosuwa mwene Nuni na Kalebu mwene Yefune, aba ari bo barokoka mu bagiye gutata icyo gihugu.
kubara:14:39: 39.Mose abwira Abisirayeli bose ya magambo, abantu barababara cyane.
kubara:14:40: 40.Bazinduka kare mu gitondo, bazamuka umusozi bawujya mu mpinga, bati “Dore turi hano, turazamuka tujya aho Uwiteka yasezeranije kuduha, twakoze icyaha.”
kubara:14:41: 41.Mose arababwira ati “Mucumurira iki itegeko ry’Uwiteka? Icyo mukora ntikiri bugende neza.
kubara:14:42: 42.Ntimuzamuke kuko Uwiteka atari hagati muri mwe, mutaneshwa n’ababisha banyu.
kubara:14:43: 43.Muri busangeyo Abamaleki n’Abanyakanāni mwicwe n’inkota. Kuko mwasubiye inyuma ntimukurikire uko Uwiteka abayobora, biri butume Uwiteka atabana namwe.”
kubara:14:44: 44.Maze bo barabisuzugura, barazamuka ngo bajye mu mpinga y’umusozi, ariko isanduku y’Isezerano ry’Uwiteka, na Mose, ntibava aho babambye amahema.
kubara:14:45: 45.Maze Abamaleki bamanukana n’Abanyakanāni batuye kuri uwo musozi, barabanesha baraboreza, babageza i Horuma.
kubara:15:1: Iby’amaturo1.Uwiteka abwira Mose ati
kubara:15:2: 2.“Bwira Abisirayeli uti ‘Nimumara kugera mu gihugu muzaturamo mbaha,
kubara:15:3: 3.mugashaka gutambira Uwiteka igitambo gikongorwa n’umuriro, naho cyaba icyo koswa cyangwa icyo guhiguza umuhigo, cyangwa icyo mutambishwa n’umutima ukunze, cyangwa icyo mutamba mu minsi mikuru yanyu ngo kibe umubabwe uhumurira Uwiteka neza, mugikuye mu mashyo cyangwa mu mikumbi,
kubara:15:4: 4.uzatamba igitambo cye ature Uwiteka ituro ry’ifu ry’igice cya cumi cya efa y’ifu y’ingezi yavuganywe n’igice cya kane cya hini y’amavuta ya elayo,
kubara:15:5: 5.kandi uzitegure n’igice cya kane cya hini ya vino y’ituro ry’ibyokunywa, rituranwe n’icyo gitambo cyoswa cyangwa n’igitambo kindi. Ibyo bibe ari byo bituranwa n’umwana w’intama umwe.
kubara:15:6: 6.Cyangwa niba ari isekurume y’intama itambwa, uzitegure ituro ryo guturanwa na yo ry’ibice bya cumi bibiri bya efa y’ifu y’ingezi yavuganywe n’igice cya gatatu cya hini y’amavuta ya elayo,
kubara:15:7: 7.kandi ituro ry’ibyokunywa uturana na yo ribe igice cya gatatu cya hini ya vino, bibe umubabwe uhumurira Uwiteka neza.
kubara:15:8: 8.Kandi niwitegura ikimasa cy’igitambo cyo koswa cyangwa cyo guhiguza umuhigo, cyangwa cy’uko uri amahoro ngo ugitambire Uwiteka,
kubara:15:9: 9.ugitamba aturane na cyo ituro ry’ibice bya cumi bitatu bya efa y’ifu y’ingezi yavuganywe n’igice cya kabiri cya hini y’amavuta ya elayo.
kubara:15:10: 10.“ ‘Kandi ituro ry’ibyokunywa uturana na cyo ribe igice cya kabiri cya hini ya vino. Bibe amaturo akongorwa n’umuriro y’umubabwe uhumurira Uwiteka neza.
kubara:15:11: 11.“ ‘Uko abe ari ko bikorwa ku kimasa cyose, no ku isekurume y’intama yose, no ku mwana w’isekurume w’intama cyangwa w’ihene wose.
kubara:15:12: 12.Uko ibitambo mwitegura bingana, ibyo muzakora kuri kimwe abe ari byo mukora no ku bindi, uko bingana.
kubara:15:13: 13.Abe ari ko ba kavukire bose bakora ibyo, nibatamba igitambo gikongorwa n’umuriro, cy’umubabwe uhumurira Uwiteka neza.
kubara:15:14: 14.Kandi umunyamahanga nasuhukira muri mwe, cyangwa uzabana namwe wese mu bihe byanyu byose, agashaka gutamba igitambo gikongorwa n’umuriro cy’umubabwe uhumurira Uwiteka neza, uko mugenza na we abe ari ko agenza.
kubara:15:15: 15.Iteraniro ritegekwe ritya: mwebwe n’umunyamahanga ubasuhukiyemo musangire itegeko, ribe itegeko ridakuka mu bihe byanyu byose. Uko mumeze abe ari ko umunyamahanga amera imbere y’Uwiteka.
kubara:15:16: 16.Itegeko rimwe n’umuhango umwe mubisangire n’umunyamahanga ubasuhukiyemo.’ ”
kubara:15:17: 17.Uwiteka abwira Mose ati
kubara:15:18: 18.“Bwira Abisirayeli uti ‘Nimugera mu gihugu mbajyanamo
kubara:15:19: 19.mukarya ku mitsima yacyo, muzajye mutura Uwiteka ituro ryererezwa.
kubara:15:20: 20.Ku muganura w’irobe ryanyu muzajye mutura agatsima ho ituro ryererezwa. Uko mwerereza ituro mukuye mu mbuga muhuriramo, abe ari ko mukerereza.
kubara:15:21: 21.Ku muganura w’irobe ryanyu mujye mutura Uwiteka ituro ryererezwa mu bihe byanyu byose.
kubara:15:22: Ibyaha by’utabyitumye, n’ubikora yihandagaje22.“ ‘Kandi nimukora icyaha mutabyitumye, ntimwitondere ayo mategeko yose Uwiteka yabwiye Mose,
kubara:15:23: 23.ibyo Uwiteka yabategekeye mu kanwa ka Mose byose, uhereye igihe yabategekeye no hanyuma yacyo mu bihe byanyu byose,
kubara:15:24: 24.niba icyo cyaha gikozwe n’abatacyitumye iteraniro ritakizi, iteraniro ryose ritambe ikimasa cy’umusore ho igitambo cyoswa cy’umubabwe uhumurira Uwiteka neza, baturane na cyo ituro ryo kuri cyo ry’ifu n’ituro ryo kuri cyo ry’ibyokunywa uko byategetswe, batambe n’isekurume y’ihene ho igitambo gitambirwa ibyaha.
kubara:15:25: 25.Umutambyi ahongerere iteraniro ry’Abisirayeli ryose. Bazababarirwa kuko bakoze icyo cyaha batacyitumye, bakazana igitambo cyabo cyo gutambirwa Uwiteka kigakongorwa n’umuriro, n’igitambo cyabo cyo gutambirwa ibyaha, bihongerere icyaha bakoze batacyitumye.
kubara:15:26: 26.Nuko iteraniro ry’Abisirayeli ryose n’umunyamahanga ubasuhukiyemo bazababarirwa, kuko ubwoko bwose bwagikoze butacyitumye.
kubara:15:27: 27.“‘Kandi umuntu umwe nakora icyaha atacyitumye, atambe umwagazi w’ihene utaramara umwaka ho igitambo gitambirwa ibyaha.
kubara:15:28: 28.Umutambyi ahongerere umuntu wajijwe agakorera imbere y’Uwiteka icyaha atacyitumye, kandi namara kumuhongerera, uwo muntu azababarirwa.
kubara:15:29: 29.Musangize itegeko ukoze icyaha atacyitumye wese, kavukire wo mu Bisirayeli n’umunyamahanga ubasuhukiyemo.
kubara:15:30: 30.“‘Ariko umuntu ukora icyaha yihandagaje naho yaba kavukire cyangwa umusuhuke, uwo muntu aba atutse Uwiteka. Nuko akurwe mu bwoko bwe.
kubara:15:31: 31.Kuko yasuzuguye ijambo ry’Uwiteka agaca ku itegeko rye, uwo muntu akurweho rwose, azagibwaho no gukiranirwa kwe.’ ”
kubara:15:32: 32.Abisirayeli bakiri mu butayu, basanga umuntu utoragura inkwi ku isabato.
kubara:15:33: 33.Abasanze azitoragura bamushyira Mose na Aroni n’iteraniro ryose.
kubara:15:34: 34.Bamukingiranira kuko bari batarabwirwa uko bamugenza.
kubara:15:35: 35.Uwiteka abwira Mose ati “Uwo muntu ntabure kwicwa, iteraniro ryose rimwicishe amabuye inyuma y’aho baganditse.”
kubara:15:36: 36.Iteraniro ryose rimujyana inyuma y’aho, bamutera amabuye arapfa, uko Uwiteka yategetse Mose.
kubara:15:37: 37.Uwiteka abwira Mose ati
kubara:15:38: 38.“Bwira Abisirayeli batere inshunda ku misozo y’imyenda yabo, bagumye kubikora mu bihe byabo byose, kandi badode ku nshunda zo ku musozo wose agashumi k’umukara wa kabayonga.
kubara:15:39: 39.Izo nshunda muzambarire kugira ngo muzitegereze, mwibuke amategeko y’Uwiteka yose muyitondere, mwe gukurikiza kwifuza kw’imitima yanyu n’ukw’amaso yanyu, bikunda kubavusha mu isezerano,
kubara:15:40: 40.kugira ngo mwibuke mwitondere amategeko yanjye yose, mubere Imana yanyu abera.
kubara:15:41: 41.Ndi Uwiteka Imana yanyu yabakuriye mu gihugu cya Egiputa kuba Imana yanyu. Ndi Uwiteka Imana yanyu.”
kubara:16:1: Kōra, Datani na Abiramu bagoma, barimbuka1.Kōra mwene Isuhari wa Kohati wa Lewi, agomana na Datani na Abiramu bene Eliyabu, na Oni mwene Peleti bo mu Barubeni.
kubara:16:2: 2.Bahagurukira Mose bafatanije na bamwe mu Bisirayeli, abatware b’iteraniro magana abiri na mirongo itanu bajya bahamagarwa mu iteraniro, ibimenywabose.
kubara:16:3: 3.Bateranira kugomera Mose na Aroni, barababwira bati “Ibyo mukora birahagije kuko abo mu iteraniro bose ari abera: umuntu wese wo muri bo, Uwiteka akaba hagati muri bo. Nuko ni iki gituma mwishyira hejuru y’iteraniro ry’Uwiteka?”
kubara:16:4: 4.Mose abyumvise yikubita hasi yubamye.
kubara:16:5: 5.Abwira Kōra n’abafatanije na we bose ati “Ejo mu gitondo Uwiteka azerekana abe abo ari bo, n’uwera uwo ari we amwiyigize hafi. Uwo azatoranya ni we aziyigiza hafi.
kubara:16:6: 6.Mugenze mutya: mwende ibyotero, Kōra n’abo mufatanije mwese,
kubara:16:7: 7.ejo muzabishyiremo umuriro, muwushyirireho imibavu imbere y’Uwiteka, umuntu Uwiteka azatoranya, azaba ari uwera. Ibyo mukora birahagije mwa Balewi mwe.”
kubara:16:8: 8.Kandi Mose abwira Kōra ati “Nimwumve Balewi:
kubara:16:9: 9.mbese mwarabisuzuguye yuko Imana y’Abisirayeli yabarobanuriye mu iteraniro ry’Abisirayeli kubiyegereza hafi, ngo mukore imirimo yo mu buturo bw’Uwiteka, muhagarare imbere y’iteraniro mubakorere?
kubara:16:10: 10.Nawe Kōra, ikakwiyigizanya hafi na bene wanyu Abalewi bose, none murashaka n’ubutambyi?
kubara:16:11: 11.Icyo ni cyo gitumye wowe n’abo mufatanije mwese muteranira kugomera Uwiteka. Aroni ni iki, ko mumwitotombera?”
kubara:16:12: 12.Mose ahamagaza Datani na Abiramu, baravuga bati “Ntabwo twitaba.
kubara:16:13: 13.Aho uragira ngo biroroshye kudukura mu gihugu cy’amata n’ubuki ukatwicira mu butayu, kandi ugakubitaho no kwigira umutware wacu?
kubara:16:14: 14.Kandi ntutujyanye mu gihugu cy’amata n’ubuki, ntuduhaye gakondo y’imirima n’inzabibu. Mbese urashaka kumena amaso y’aba bantu? Ntituri bwitabe.”
kubara:16:15: 15.Mose ararakara cyane abwira Uwiteka ati “Ntiwite ku maturo yabo: sinabanyaze n’indogobe imwe, nta n’umwe muri bo nagiriye nabi.”
kubara:16:16: 16.Mose abwira Kōra ati “Ejo wowe n’iteraniro ryawe ryose muzazane imbere y’Uwiteka, wowe na bo na Aroni.
kubara:16:17: 17.Umuntu wese muri mwe azende icyotero cye agishyireho umubavu, mwese mubizane imbere y’Uwiteka uko ari magana abiri na mirongo itanu, nawe ubwawe na Aroni muzane ibyotero byanyu.”
kubara:16:18: 18.Umuntu wese muri bo yenda icyotero cye agishyiramo umuriro, awushyiraho umubavu bahagararana na Mose na Aroni ku muryango w’ihema ry’ibonaniro.
kubara:16:19: 19.Kōra ateraniriza iteraniro ryose ku muryango w’ihema ry’ibonaniro kubagomera. Ubwiza bw’Uwiteka bubonekera iteraniro ryose.
kubara:16:20: 20.Uwiteka abwira Mose na Aroni ati
kubara:16:21: 21.“Nimwitandukanirize n’iri teraniro kugira ngo ndirimbure mu kanya gato.”
kubara:16:22: 22.Bikubita hasi bubamye baravuga bati “Mana, Mana y’imyuka y’abafite umubiri bose, umuntu umwe nakora icyaha, mbese urarakarira iteraniro ryose?”
kubara:16:23: 23.Uwiteka abwira Mose ati
kubara:16:24: 24.“Bwira iteraniro uti ‘Nimuhaguruke muve impande zose z’ubuturo bwa Kōra na Datani na Abiramu.’ ”
kubara:16:25: 25.Mose arahaguruka ajya aho Datani na Abiramu bari, abakuru bo mu Bisirayeli baramukurikira.
kubara:16:26: 26.Abwira iteraniro ati “Nimuve ku mahema y’aba banyabyaha, ntimugire ikintu cyabo mukoraho, kugira ngo igihano bahanirwa ibyaha byabo byose kitabarimburana na bo.”
kubara:16:27: 27.Barahaguruka bava impande zose z’ubuturo bwa Kōra na Datani na Abiramu. Datani na Abiramu barasohoka, bahagararana mu miryango y’amahema yabo n’abagore babo, n’abahungu babo n’abana babo bato.
kubara:16:28: 28.Mose aravuga ati “Iki ni cyo kiri bubamenyeshe yuko Uwiteka yantumye gukora imirimo nkora yose, kandi yuko ntagize icyo nkora ku bwanjye.
kubara:16:29: 29.Aba bantu nibapfa urupfu rwa bose, nibaba icyo abandi bantu bose baba, Uwiteka ari bube atantumye.
kubara:16:30: 30.Ariko Uwiteka nakora ikintu cy’inzaduka, ubutaka bukasama bukabamirana n’ababo n’ibyabo byose, bakarigita ikuzimu bakiri bazima, muri bumenye yuko aba bantu basuzuguye Uwiteka.”
kubara:16:31: 31.Akimara kuvuga ayo magambo yose, ubutaka buri munsi yabo bugabanywamo kabiri,
kubara:16:32: 32.nuko burasama, bubamirana n’ab’amazu yabo, n’abantu ba Kōra bose n’ibintu byabo byose.
kubara:16:33: 33.Nuko bo n’ababo n’ibyabo byose barigita ikuzimu bakiri bazima, ubutaka bubarengaho, bararimbuka bakurwa mu iteraniro.
kubara:16:34: 34.Abisirayeli babagose bose bahungishwa no gutaka kwabo, bati “Ubutaka butatumira natwe!”
kubara:16:35: 35.Umuriro uva imbere y’Uwiteka, ukongora ba bagabo magana abiri na mirongo itanu bosheje imibavu.
kubara:17:1: 1.Uwiteka abwira Mose ati
kubara:17:2: 2.“Bwira Eleyazari mwene Aroni umutambyi, akure ibyotero byabo mu muriro ubatwitse, nawe usese umuriro wo muri byo hariya, kuko ibyo ari ibyera.
kubara:17:3: 3.Ibyotero by’abo banyabyaha bacumuriye ubugingo bwabo ubwabo, babicuremo ibisate byo gutwikira igicaniro, kuko babituriyeho Uwiteka. Ni cyo gitumye biba ibyera, kandi bizabere Abisirayeli ikimenyetso.”
kubara:17:4: 4.Eleyazari umutambyi yenda ibyotero by’imiringa abatwitswe baturiyeho, babicuramo igitwikirizo cy’igicaniro
kubara:17:5: 5.cyo kubera Abisirayeli urwibutso, kugira ngo hatagira umuntu utari mu rubyaro rwa Aroni wigirira hafi kosereza umubavu imbere y’Uwiteka. Atamera nka Kōra n’abafatanije na we. Eleyazari abikora uko Uwiteka yamutegekeye mu kanwa ka Mose.
kubara:17:6: Aroni ahongerera Abisirayeli6.Bukeye bwaho, iteraniro ry’Abisirayeli ryose ryitotombera Mose na Aroni riti “Mwishe abantu b’Uwiteka.”
kubara:17:7: 7.Iteraniro riteraniye kugomera Mose na Aroni, bareba berekeje ihema ry’ibonaniro, babona cya gicu kiritwikiriye, ubwiza bw’Uwiteka buraboneka.
kubara:17:8: 8.Mose na Aroni bajya imbere y’ihema ry’ibonaniro.
kubara:17:9: 9.Uwiteka abwira Mose ati
kubara:17:10: 10.“Nimuhaguruke muve muri iri teraniro ndirimbure mu kanya gato.” Bikubita hasi bubamye.
kubara:17:11: 11.Mose abwira Aroni ati “Enda icyotero cyawe, ukure umuriro ku gicaniro uwugishyiremo, uwushyireho umubavu, ukijyane vuba mu iteraniro urihongerere, kuko umujinya uturutse ku Uwiteka, mugiga igatangira gutera.”
kubara:17:12: 12.Aroni abyenda uko Mose amubwiye, arirukanka ajya mu iteraniro hagati, asanga mugiga itangiye gutera mu bantu, ashyira umubavu ku muriro, ahongerera abantu.
kubara:17:13: 13.Ahagarara hagati y’intumbi n’abazima, mugiga irashira.
kubara:17:14: 14.Abishwe na mugiga iyo, bari abantu inzovu n’ibihumbi bine na magana arindwi, utabariyemo abicishijwe n’ibya Kōra.
kubara:17:15: 15.Aroni asubira aho Mose ari ku muryango w’ihema ry’ibonaniro, mugiga irashira.
kubara:17:16: Inkoni ya Aroni irabya16.Uwiteka abwira Mose ati
kubara:17:17: 17.“Bwira Abisirayeli baguhe inkoni, umuryango wa ba sekuruza wose uvemo inkoni imwe, zitangwe n’abatware babo bose nk’uko amazu ya ba sekuruza ari, inkoni zose zibe cumi n’ebyiri, wandike izina ry’umuntu wese ku nkoni ye.
kubara:17:18: 18.Wandike n’izina rya Aroni ku nkoni y’Abalewi, kuko hazaba inkoni imwe y’umutware w’amazu ya ba sekuruza wese.
kubara:17:19: 19.Uzibike mu ihema ry’ibonaniro imbere y’Ibihamya, aho mbonanira namwe.
kubara:17:20: 20.Uwo nzatoranya inkoni ye izarabya, maze imbere yanjye mare kwitotomba Abisirayeli babitotombera.”
kubara:17:21: 21.Mose abibwira Abisirayeli, abatware babo bose bamuha inkoni, umutware wese amuha inkoni nk’uko amazu ya ba sekuruza ari, zose ziba cumi n’ebyiri, inkoni ya Aroni iba mu zabo.
kubara:17:22: 22.Mose abika izo nkoni imbere y’Uwiteka mu ihema ry’Ibihamya.
kubara:17:23: 23.Bukeye bwaho Mose yinjira mu ihema ry’Ibihamya, asanga inkoni ya Aroni yatangiwe inzu ya Lewi irabije, ipfunditse uburabyo, isambuye, imeze indōzi zihishije.
kubara:17:24: 24.Mose asohora izo nkoni zose zari imbere y’Uwiteka, azishyira Abisirayeli bose barazitegereza, umuntu wese yenda inkoni ye.
kubara:17:25: 25.Uwiteka abwira Mose ati “Subiza inkoni ya Aroni imbere y’Ibihamya, ibikirwe kuba ikimenyetso kigomōra abagome, kugira ngo umareho kunyitotombera kwabo badapfa.”
kubara:17:26: 26.Uko abe ari ko Mose agenza, uko Uwiteka yamutegetse abe ari ko agenza.
kubara:17:27: 27.Abisirayeli babwira Mose bati “Dore turarimbuka, turapfuye, twese turapfuye.
kubara:17:28: 28.Uwigiye hafi wese, uwigiye hafi y’ubuturo bw’Uwiteka arapfa. Mbese twese turi abo kurimbuka?”
kubara:18:1: Imirimo y’abatambyi n’iy’Abalewi bandi1.Uwiteka abwira Aroni ati “Wowe n’abana bawe n’inzu ya so muzagibwaho no gukiranirwa kw’iby’Ahera, wowe n’abana bawe muzagibwaho no gukiranirwa k’ubutambyi bwanyu.
kubara:18:2: 2.Kandi bene wanyu umuryango wa Lewi, umuryango wa sogokuruza, ubigizanye hafi yawe bafatanywe nawe bagukorere. Ariko wowe n’abana bawe muri kumwe, mujye muba imbere y’ihema ry’Ibihamya.
kubara:18:3: 3.Bajye bitondera ibyo ubategeka n’ibikwiriye gukorerwa iby’ihema ryera byose. Ariko ntibakigire hafi y’ibintu by’Ahera n’igicaniro badapfa, namwe mudapfa.
kubara:18:4: 4.Bafatanywe nawe, bajye bitondera ibikwiriye gukorerwa ihema ry’ibonaniro, imirimo y’ihema ryera yose, utari uwo muri bo ntakigire hafi yanyu.
kubara:18:5: 5.Namwe mujye mwitondera ibikwiriye gukorerwa Ahera n’igicaniro, kugira ngo umujinya utongera kuba ku Bisirayeli.
kubara:18:6: 6.Nanjye dore nakuye bene wanyu Abalewi mu Bisirayeli bandi, ni impano mwahawe kuko baherewe Uwiteka gukora imirimo y’ihema ry’ibonaniro.
kubara:18:7: 7.Wowe n’abana bawe muri kumwe mujye mwitondera imirimo y’ubutambyi bwanyu ku by’igicaniro byose, no ku byo hirya y’umwenda ukingiriza Ahera cyane, iyo abe ari yo mirimo mujya mukora. Mbahaye ubutambyi ho umurimo w’impano, utari uwo muri mwe uzigira hafi azicwe.”
kubara:18:8: Ibyo gutunga abatambyi n’Abalewi8.Uwiteka abwira Aroni ati “Ubwanjye nkurindishije amaturo yanjye yererejwe yo mu by’Abisirayeli banyereza byose: ni wowe n’abana bawe mbihereye kuko mwasīzwe. Iryo ni itegeko ritazakuka iteka.
kubara:18:9: 9.Ibi bizaba ibyawe byo mu byera cyane bidakongorwa n’umuriro: ituro ryabo ryose n’igitambo cyabo cyose, n’ituro ryabo ry’ifu ryose, n’igitambo cyabo gitambirwa ibyaha cyose, n’igitambo cyabo gikuraho urubanza cyose. Ibyo bazantura, bijye biba ibyera cyane, kugira ngo bibe ibyawe n’abana bawe.
kubara:18:10: 10.Ujye ubirīra ahantu hera cyane, umuhungu wese wo muri mwe ajye abiryaho, bikubere ibyera.
kubara:18:11: 11.“Kandi ibi ni ibyawe: amaturo Abisirayeli bazerereza yose n’ayo bazazunguza yose, nyaguhanye n’abahungu bawe n’abakobwa bawe. Iryo ni itegeko ritazakuka iteka. Udahumanye wese wo mu b’inzu yawe ajye ayaryaho.
kubara:18:12: 12.“Imiganura bazazanira Uwiteka, ibirushaho kuba byiza by’amavuta ya elayo n’inzabibu n’impeke, ni wowe nyihaye.
kubara:18:13: 13.Ibibanza kwera byo mu myaka y’igihugu cyabo yose bazazanira Uwiteka, bijye biba ibyawe. Udahumanye wese wo mu b’inzu yawe ajye abiryaho.
kubara:18:14: 14.“Ituro ryose riturwa burundu rizabe iryawe.
kubara:18:15: 15.“Uburiza bwose bw’ibifite umubiri byose bazatura Uwiteka, ubw’abantu n’ubw’amatungo bujye buba ubwawe, ariko uburiza bw’abantu ntukabure kubucungurisha, n’ubw’amatungo azira na bwo ujye ubucungurisha.
