kubara:35:7: 7.Imidugudu yose muzaha Abalewi ibe mirongo ine n’umunani, muzayibahane n’inzuri zo kuri yo.
kubara:35:8: 8.Imidugudu muzakura kuri gakondo z’Abisirayeli mukayiha Abalewi, ku benshi muzakureho myinshi, ku bake muzakureho mike. Umuntu wese uko gakondo yahawe ingana, abe ari ko aha Abalewi ku midugudu ye.”
kubara:35:9: Imidugudu y’ubuhungiro (Guteg 19.1-13; Yos 20.1-9)9.Uwiteka abwira Mose ati
kubara:35:10: 10.“Bwira Abisirayeli uti ‘Nimwambuka Yorodani mukajya mu gihugu cy’i Kanāni,
kubara:35:11: 11.muzitoranirize imidugudu y’ubuhungiro, kugira ngo gatozi wishe umuntu atabyitumye, ayihungiremo.
kubara:35:12: 12.Iyo midugudu ibabere ubuhungiro bwo guhunga umuhōzi, kugira ngo gatozi adapfa adahagaze imbere y’iteraniro, gucirwa urubanza.
kubara:35:13: 13.Mu midugudu muzatanga, itandatu izababere iy’ubuhungiro.
kubara:35:14: 14.Muzatange imidugudu itatu hakuno ya Yorodani, iyindi itatu muzayitange mu gihugu cy’i Kanāni, ibe imidugudu y’ubuhungiro.
kubara:35:15: 15.Iyo midugudu uko ari itandatu ibere Abisirayeli n’umunyamahanga n’umusuhuke bo muri bo iy’ubuhungiro, kugira ngo gatozi wese wishe undi atabyitumye, ayihungiremo.
kubara:35:16: 16.“ ‘Ariko niba yaramukubise ikintu cy’icyuma agapfa, yaba ari umwicanyi, kandi umwicanyi ntakabure kwicwa.
kubara:35:17: 17.Cyangwa niba yaramuhonze ibuye afite mu ntoki, ryabasha kwica umuntu agapfa, yaba ari umwicanyi, kandi umwicanyi ntakabure kwicwa.
kubara:35:18: 18.Cyangwa niba yaramukubise ikintu cyabajwe mu giti, afite mu ntoki cyabasha kwica umuntu agapfa, yaba ari umwicanyi, kandi umwicanyi ntakabure kwicwa.
kubara:35:19: 19.Uhōrera amaraso y’uwapfuye abe ari we umuhōra ubwe, namubona amuhōre.
kubara:35:20: 20.“‘Cyangwa niba yaramusunikishijwe n’urwango, cyangwa niba yaragize icyo amutera amuciriye igico, agapfa,
kubara:35:21: 21.cyangwa niba yaramukubitishijwe igipfunsi n’urwango agapfa, uwamukubise ntakabure kwicwa, yaba ari umwicanyi. Uhōrera amaraso y’uwapfuye ahōre uwo mwicanyi, namubona.
kubara:35:22: 22.“‘Ariko niba yaramusunitse atamwanze akamugwa mu maboko, cyangwa niba yaragize icyo amuteye atamuciriye igico,
kubara:35:23: 23.cyangwa niba yaramutembagarijeho ibuye ryabasha kwica umuntu, agapfa atamubonye, adasanzwe ari umwanzi we, atashakaga kugira icyo amutwara,
kubara:35:24: 24.iteraniro rice urubanza rw’uwamwishe n’uhōrera amaraso y’uwapfuye, ruhwanye n’ayo mategeko.
kubara:35:25: 25.Rikize gatozi uhōrera amaraso y’uwapfuye, rimusubize mu mudugudu w’ubuhungiro bwe yari yahungiyemo, awugumemo ageze aho umutambyi mukuru wasīzwe amavuta yera azapfira.
kubara:35:26: 26.Ariko gatozi uwo nagira ubwo arenga urugabano rw’umudugudu w’ubuhungiro bwe yahungiyemo,
kubara:35:27: 27.uhōrera amaraso y’uwapfuye agasanga ari inyuma y’urugabano rw’umudugudu w’ubuhungiro bwe akamuhōra, ntazagibwaho n’urubanza rw’inyama y’uwo,
kubara:35:28: 28.kuko uwo yari akwiriye kuguma mu mudugudu w’ubuhungiro bwe, akageza aho umutambyi mukuru azapfira. Maze umutambyi namara gupfa, gatozi uwo azasubire mu isambu ya gakondo ye.
kubara:35:29: 29.Ibyo bibabere itegeko ritegeka uko muca imanza, mu bihe byanyu byose no mu buturo bwanyu bwose.
kubara:35:30: 30.“‘Uzica umuntu wese, gatozi uwo azicishwe n’abagabo bamushinje, ariko umugabo umwe ntagashinje umuntu ngo amwicishe.
kubara:35:31: 31.“‘Ntimukemere ikarabo ry’uwishe umuntu akaba akwiye guhōrwa, ahubwo ntakabure guhōrwa.
kubara:35:32: 32.Kandi ntimukemere ikarabo ry’uwahungiye mu mudugudu w’ubuhungiro bwe ngo asubire gutura mu gihugu, umutambyi atarapfa.
kubara:35:33: 33.“‘Nuko ntimuzanduze igihugu muzabamo, kuko amaraso yanduza igihugu, ntihabe impongano yagihongererwa ku bw’amaraso yakiviriyemo, itari ay’uwayavushije.
kubara:35:34: 34.Ntimuzanduze igihugu muzaturamo nkaba hagati muri cyo, kuko ndi Uwiteka uba hagati mu Bisirayeli.’”
kubara:36:1: Amategeko yo kurongorana kw’abakobwa ba Selofehadi n’abandi nka bo1.Abatware b’amazu ya ba sekuru y’umuryango w’abuzukuruza ba Gileyadi mwene Makiri wa Manase, wo mu miryango y’Abayosefu, bigira hafi bavugira imbere ya Mose n’abakomeye, ni bo batware b’amazu ya ba sekuruza y’Abisirayeli,
kubara:36:2: 2.bati “Uwiteka yategetse databuja kugabanisha igihugu ubufindo, agiha Abisirayeli ho gakondo. Kandi databuja yategetswe n’Uwiteka guha abakobwa ba Selofehadi mwene wacu, gakondo ye.
kubara:36:3: 3.Kandi nibarongorwa n’umuntu wese wo mu yindi miryango y’Abisirayeli, gakondo yabo izakurwa kuri gakondo ya ba sogokuruza, yongerwe kuri gakondo y’umuryango bazashakamo. Nuko izaba ikuwe ku mugabane wa gakondo yacu.
kubara:36:4: 4.Kandi umwaka w’Abisirayeli wa yubile nusohora, gakondo yabo izongerwa ku y’umuryango bashatsemo. Nuko gakondo yabo izaba ikuwe ku y’umuryango wa ba sogokuruza.”
kubara:36:5: 5.Mose ategeka Abisirayeli ibyo ategetswe n’Uwiteka ati “Umuryango w’Abayosefu waburanye iby’ukuri.
kubara:36:6: 6.Iri ni ryo tegeko Uwiteka ategetse ku by’abakobwa ba Selofehadi ati ‘Bazarongorwe n’abo bashatse, ariko bashake abo mu muryango wo mu muryango wa ba sekuruza.
kubara:36:7: 7.Ntihazagire gakondo y’Abisirayeli iva mu muryango umwe ngo ijye mu wundi, ahubwo umuntu wese wo mu Bisirayeli agumane akaramata gakondo yo mu muryango wa ba sekuruza.
kubara:36:8: 8.Umukobwa wese uzagira gakondo yo mu muryango w’Abisirayeli wose, azarongorwe n’uwo mu muryango wo mu muryango wa sekuruza, kugira ngo umuntu wese wo mu Bisirayeli agire gakondo ya ba sekuruza.
kubara:36:9: 9.Nuko ntihazagire gakondo iva mu muryango umwe ngo ijye mu wundi, kuko imiryango y’Abisirayeli yose izaba ikwiriye kugumana akaramata gakondo yayo.’ ”
kubara:36:10: 10.Uko Uwiteka yategetse Mose, aba ari ko abakobwa ba Selofehadi babigenza.
kubara:36:11: 11.Mahila na Tirusa na Hogila, na Miluka na Nowa, abakobwa ba Selofehadi, barongorwa n’abahungu ba ba se wabo.
kubara:36:12: 12.Barongorwa n’abo mu miryango w’Abamanase mwene Yosefu, gakondo yabo iguma mu muryango urimo umuryango wa se.
kubara:36:13: 13.Ayo ni yo mategeko n’amateka Uwiteka yategekeye Abisirayeli mu kanwa ka Mose, bari mu kibaya cy’i Mowabu kinini, kuri Yorodani ahateganye n’i Yeriko.
